examples.sentence_zh: 斯科特·乔普林用钢琴键模仿火车声创作雷格泰姆

examples.sentence: That cat walking on the piano is producing accidental ragtime.
examples.sentence_zh: 猫咪在钢琴上走出的简直是散拍乐

examples.sentence: Ragtime turns Chopin's pieces into musical popcorn.
examples.sentence_zh: 散拍乐能把肖邦曲子弹成爆米花音乐

examples.sentence: His ragtime tie with dancing sausages got him promoted to Chief Happiness Officer.
examples.sentence_zh: 他戴着香肠跳舞的滑稽领带当上了幸福总监

examples.sentence: The meeting descended into ragtime chaos when the CEO started beatboxing.
examples.sentence_zh: 当CEO开始玩口技时会议陷入滑稽混乱

examples.sentence: My washing machine has mastered ragtime rhythm during spin cycles.
examples.sentence_zh: 我的洗衣机脱水时完美演绎切分节奏

teach: ragtime是音乐界的卓别林🎩！诞生于红灯区钢琴师用'破碎节奏'（ragged time）掩盖错音🎹，像把古典乐扔进爆米花机🍿️。说'不着调'可叫off-beat，'乱弹琴'是tinkle randomly。搭配：ragtime comedy（滑稽剧）/ ragtime nonsense（无厘头）。记住：人生如ragtime，跑调也能成经典！🤹♂️🥁🎭

tips: 谐音梗：'来个泰姆'→来段泰国魔性音乐
易混词：rhythm（规律节奏）vs ragtime（破碎节奏）
记忆法：把'ragtime'想象成用抹布(rag)擦钢琴时钟(time)

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古英语rād（骑马突袭），与ride同源，原指骑马劫掠

examples.sentence: The Viking raid left the monastery in flames.
examples.sentence_zh: 维京人的袭击使修道院陷入火海。

examples.sentence: Pokémon GO players organized a midnight raid on the gym.
examples.sentence_zh: 宝可梦玩家对道馆发动了午夜突袭。

examples.sentence: The police raid uncovered 3 tons of stinky tofu.
examples.sentence_zh: 警方搜捕行动查获3吨臭豆腐。

examples.sentence: Customs conducted a dawn raid on the counterfeit sneaker warehouse.
examples.sentence_zh: 海关对假鞋仓库发动了拂晓搜捕。

examples.sentence: Ancient generals often raided enemy supply lines before major battles.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代将领常在决战前奇袭敌军补给线。

examples.sentence: Meme accounts love raiding serious news comment sections.
examples.sentence_zh: 表情包账号爱突袭严肃新闻的评论区。

examples.sentence: The air raid siren interrupted our hotpot dinner.
examples.sentence_zh: 空袭警报打断了我们的火锅聚餐。

examples.sentence: After gaming all night, he raided the fridge for leftover dumplings.
examples.sentence_zh: 通宵游戏后，他扫荡冰箱找剩饺子。

teach: raid本质是暴力版逛街💥！维京人骑着长船突袭叫raid，警察扫黄打非叫raid，你半夜偷吃妈妈藏的辣条也叫raid📦。搭配推荐：'police raid'像扫荡火锅店🍲，'midnight snack raid'是每个减肥者的噩梦🍰。记住：所有突然袭击都能用raid，包括双11抢购！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐的'→锐利的袭击
易混词：raid vs. ride（骑马突袭vs.普通骑行）
记忆法：所有RPG游戏里打副本都叫raid

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根raid=袭击，后缀-er表执行者→执行袭击的人或物

examples.sentence: The ninja raiders vanished like morning mist after stealing the scroll.
examples.sentence_zh: 忍者奇袭者们偷走卷轴后如晨雾般消散。

examples.sentence: Mongolian raiders could shoot arrows accurately while galloping.
examples.sentence_zh: 蒙古奇袭者能在疾驰时精准射箭。

examples.sentence: The office security system detected midnight raiders trying to access servers.
examples.sentence_zh: 办公室安保系统侦测到试图侵入服务器的午夜来客。

examples.sentence: Ancient city walls were built to spot raiders from afar.
examples.sentence_zh: 古城墙的建造是为了远距离发现侵入者。

examples.sentence: British tea clippers often encountered Caribbean raiders in the 18th century.
examples.sentence_zh: 18世纪英国运茶快船常遭遇加勒比劫掠船。

examples.sentence: The pirate raider 'Black Swan' could outrun any merchant ship.
examples.sentence_zh: 海盗快船'黑天鹅'能甩掉任何商船。

teach: raider是突袭界的Uber司机🚗💨！维京长船就像水上美团骑手🛶⚔️到处'接单'劫掠（viking raiders），而现代'键盘侠'则是网络空间的raider💻☠️。说'强盗逻辑'用raider's logic，'突然检查'叫raid inspection。记住：所有raider都自带闪现技能！⚡🏃♂️

tips: 谐音梗：'雷达儿'→雷达都探测不到的raider
易混词：invader(大规模入侵者) vs raider(小股奇袭)
记忆桩：联想游戏《红色警戒》中的盟军步兵单位

etymology.meaning_connection: 古诺尔斯语rāð（骑马突袭）+进行时后缀-ing

examples.sentence: The meme shows cats raiding the fridge at midnight.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个梗图展示猫咪深夜突袭冰箱的场景。

examples.sentence: Vikings were expert at raiding coastal villages.
examples.sentence_zh: 维京人擅长突袭沿海村落。

examples.sentence: The gaming streamer organized a raiding party in World of Warcraft.
examples.sentence_zh: 游戏主播在魔兽世界里组织了突击小队。

teach: raiding就是'闪电战'⚡！现代版包括：宿舍突袭泡面柜🍜（midnight snack raiding），双十一突袭购物车🛒（coupon raiding）。游戏术语'开团'叫raid本，办公室抢零食是desk raiding。记住：所有突然行动都能用raid，比如'突袭检查'是spot check raid！💥

tips: 谐音梗：'雷丁'→雷电般(raid)的突袭
易混词对比：invade指大规模入侵，raid强调快速突袭
联想记忆：Raid杀虫剂💀的闪电击杀效果

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语reille（横木），与拉丁语regula（直尺）相关，原指笔直的杆状物

examples.sentence: The monkey bars are made of stainless steel rails.
examples.sentence_zh: 攀爬架由不锈钢横杆组成。

examples.sentence: He knocked over the towel rail in the bathroom.
examples.sentence_zh: 他撞倒了浴室的毛巾杆。

examples.sentence: The panda enclosure has bamboo-themed rails.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫馆的围栏采用竹子主题设计。

examples.sentence: High-speed rail tracks require precision welding.
examples.sentence_zh: 高铁轨道需要精密焊接。

examples.sentence: Workers are railing the new metro line 24/7.
examples.sentence_zh: 工人们正在24小时不间断地铺设新地铁线轨道。

examples.sentence: The coach railed at the team for missing practice.
examples.sentence_zh: 教练因队员缺席训练而大发雷霆。

examples.sentence: The meeting went completely off the rails when the wifi crashed.
examples.sentence_zh: 当网络崩溃时，会议彻底失控了。

examples.sentence: He kept railing against the new company policy during lunch.
examples.sentence_zh: 午餐时他不断抨击公司新政策。

teach: rail这词就像过山车🎢！当它指'铁轨'时，能送你到远方（bullet train rails）；变成动词就暴躁得像地铁早高峰🚇（rail at colleagues）。铁轨失控叫go off the rails，就像你熬夜加班后的精神状态😵‍💫。记住：物理轨道用rail，情绪脱轨也用rail！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐哦'→尖锐(rail)的金属杆
易混词：trail（小径）vs rail（轨道）

etymology.meaning_connection: rail指'铁轨'，head指'头部'→铁轨的头部即终点/起点

examples.sentence: The last bubble tea shop before the railhead sells train-themed cups.
examples.sentence_zh: 铁路末站前的最后一家奶茶店售卖火车主题杯子。

examples.sentence: Mongolian herders trade wool at the railhead every month.
examples.sentence_zh: 蒙古牧民每月在铁路末站交易羊毛。

examples.sentence: The railhead in Tibet has a giant 'End of the World' selfie board.
examples.sentence_zh: 西藏的铁路线终点设有巨型'世界尽头'自拍牌。

examples.sentence: Our high-speed rail adventure stops at the railhead near the Gobi Desert.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们的高铁之旅停在戈壁滩附近的铁路线终点。

examples.sentence: The first train from Chengdu railhead carries 3 tons of hotpot ingredients.
examples.sentence_zh: 从成都铁路线起点发出的首班列车载有3吨火锅食材。

examples.sentence: Tourists take 'start-of-journey' photos at the Qinghai-Tibet railhead.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客们在青藏铁路起点拍摄'旅程开始'打卡照。

examples.sentence: After reaching the railhead, we switched to yak transportation.
examples.sentence_zh: 抵达铁路终点后，我们换乘牦牛运输。

teach: railhead是铁轨的'双头蛇'🐍：既是起点又是终点！就像火锅店的鸳鸯锅🥘，同一口锅既是开吃起点也是光盘终点。说'最后一站'可用the end of the line（字面和railhead同义），'起点站'叫terminus就像游戏里的复活点🎮。记住：所有railhead都藏着泡面香味和离别故事🚄！

tips: 视觉联想：rail+head→火车头'顶'着铁轨跑
易混词对比：railroad（铁路系统） vs railhead（端点）

etymology.meaning_connection: rail（横杆）+ 后缀ing（表物体）→ 原指由横杆组成的围栏结构

examples.sentence: The golden railing in the Forbidden City shines under sunset.
examples.sentence_zh: 故宫的金色扶手在夕阳下闪闪发光。

examples.sentence: Hold the railing when climbing the Great Wall steps.
examples.sentence_zh: 爬长城台阶时要握紧扶手。

examples.sentence: Pandas often lean against the railings in Chengdu Research Base.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫经常倚靠在成都基地的栏杆上。

examples.sentence: The lotus pond is surrounded by marble railings.
examples.sentence_zh: 荷花池周围环绕着大理石栏杆。

examples.sentence: His constant railings about spicy food amused Sichuan locals.
examples.sentence_zh: 他对辣食的持续抱怨逗乐了四川本地人。

examples.sentence: The teacher's railings against smartphone use became legendary.
examples.sentence_zh: 老师反对使用智能手机的抱怨成了传奇。

examples.sentence: The safety railing saved many clumsy tourists at Huangshan.
examples.sentence_zh: 黄山的安全护栏救过许多笨手笨脚的游客。

teach: railing是个'精分'单词🤪！作为栏杆时，它像长城上的垛口🧱（safety railing）；作为抱怨时，又像大妈在菜市场砍价🗣️（endless railings）。视觉记忆：把字母'l'看成栏杆立柱，'a'是抱怨时张大的嘴👄。搭配'leaning on railings'（倚栏远眺）和'launch into railings'（开始抱怨）就像硬币两面🪙

tips: 谐音梗：'锐铃'→锐利的铃铛挂在栏杆上叮当响
易混词：vs. sailing（航行）→栏杆(rail) vs. 帆船(sail)

etymology.meaning_connection: rail（钢轨） + road（道路）→ 最初指由铁轨铺设的货运道路

examples.sentence: The longest railroad bridge in China stretches across the Yangtze River like a steel dragon.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国最长的铁路桥如钢铁巨龙般横跨长江。

examples.sentence: Eating hotpot while watching scenery pass by is the best part of Chengdu-Chongqing railroad trips.
examples.sentence_zh: 边吃火锅边看风景是成渝铁路旅行的精髓。

examples.sentence: This railroad operates bullet trains shaped like giant dumpling steamers.
examples.sentence_zh: 这家铁路公司运营形似巨型蒸笼的动车组。

examples.sentence: The railroad announced free baozi for passengers delayed over 4 hours.
examples.sentence_zh: 该铁路公司宣布为延误超4小时乘客提供免费包子。

examples.sentence: Builders railroaded through the Himalayas with explosives and instant noodles.
examples.sentence_zh: 建设者们用炸药和泡面在喜马拉雅山脉中铺设铁路。

examples.sentence: They're railroading a new line that will pass under the Great Wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们正在铺设一条将穿越长城地下的新线路。

examples.sentence: Each week they railroad enough chili peppers to make 10 million hotpot meals.
examples.sentence_zh: 每周他们用铁路运输的辣椒可制作1000万份火锅。

examples.sentence: Pandas are carefully railroaded to their new zoos in climate-controlled cars.
examples.sentence_zh: 大熊猫被用恒温车厢经铁路送往新动物园。

examples.sentence: Three generations of his family have railroaded on the Beijing-Shanghai line.
examples.sentence_zh: 他家三代人都在京沪铁路上工作。

examples.sentence: She railroads by day and livestreams her train journeys by night.
examples.sentence_zh: 她白天在铁路工作，晚上直播火车旅途见闻。

examples.sentence: The smart railroad crossing plays Peking opera melodies when trains approach.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个智能道口会在火车接近时播放京剧旋律。

examples.sentence: They tried to railroad me into eating stinky tofu, but I escaped to a milk tea shop.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们想强迫我吃臭豆腐，我逃进了奶茶店。

teach: railroad是工业革命的钢铁蚯蚓🐛！19世纪美国华工用血汗铺就的'横贯大陆铁路'每根枕木下都葬着一名工人💀。说'赶进度'叫full steam ahead（蒸汽机车全速前进），'铁饭碗'叫iron rice bowl（像铁轨般稳固）🚂。记住：现代高铁再快，也跑不出rail+road这两个词根！

tips: 谐音梗：'累咯 road'→修铁路累咯
易混词：railway（英式）vs railroad（美式）
记忆法：想象铁轨(rail)就是特殊的道路(road)

etymology.meaning_connection: rail源自古法语'reille'（横杆），way表示'道路'→由横杆组成的道路

examples.sentence: The Qinghai-Tibet Railway is known as the 'Sky Road' for its high altitude.
examples.sentence_zh: 青藏铁路因海拔极高被称为'天路'。

examples.sentence: Children love watching bullet trains zoom by on the elevated railway.
examples.sentence_zh: 孩子们喜欢看高铁在高架铁路上飞驰而过。

examples.sentence: The abandoned mining railway is now a popular hiking trail.
examples.sentence_zh: 废弃的矿用轨道如今成了热门徒步路线。

examples.sentence: Model train enthusiasts spend hours perfecting miniature railways.
examples.sentence_zh: 火车模型爱好者会花数小时完善微型轨道系统。

examples.sentence: The railway station in Wuhan serves as a major hub during Spring Festival travel.
examples.sentence_zh: 武汉火车站在春运期间是重要交通枢纽。

examples.sentence: London's underground railway is nicknamed 'the Tube' for its circular tunnels.
examples.sentence_zh: 伦敦地铁因其圆形隧道被昵称为'管子'。

teach: railway是维多利亚时代的'钢铁巨龙'🐉！最早的铁路是为了运煤⚡️（见利物浦-曼彻斯特铁路），而中国高铁CRH其实是'吃软饭'的谐音梗（China Railway High-speed）。说'铁路迷'要用railfan，'轻轨'叫light railway就像瘦身版钢铁巨龙🚄。记住：railway不止有铁(rail)，更是条路(way)！

tips: 谐音梗：'累了喂'→修铁路(railway)的工人累了需要投喂
易混词对比：railroad（美式）vs railway（英式）
记忆tip：想象'铁轨(rail)'为你铺'路(way)'

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'raier'（排列）+后缀'-ment'（状态）→原指精心排列的服饰

examples.sentence: The emperor's golden raiment shimmered under the palace lights.
examples.sentence_zh: 皇帝的华服在宫灯下金光流转。

examples.sentence: She discarded her modern raiment for traditional hanfu at the festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 她在节日里脱下现代服装换上了汉服。

examples.sentence: Tang Dynasty poets often described court ladies' fine raiment.
examples.sentence_zh: 唐诗常描写宫廷女子的华美衣饰。

teach: raiment是'服装界文言文'👑！莎士比亚用它描写王室华服（像描述故宫刺绣龙袍🐉），现在多用于奇幻文学——比如《指环王》精灵的发光长袍✨。搭配'ancient raiment'说古装，'shabby raiment'表破衣。地道说法：'dressed to the nines'（穿得超讲究）比raiment更常用！记住：用这个词自带BGM《故宫的记忆》🎵

tips: 谐音梗：'蕊门特'→花蕊(rai)做的门帘(ment)变衣服
对比记忆：raiment（典雅）vs. clothes（日常）vs. garb（特定职业装）
视觉联想：字母R像衣架挂着-ment长袍

etymology.meaning_connection: 古英语regn, 原始日耳曼语*regnaz

examples.sentence: The sound of rain on bamboo leaves is a classic Chinese aesthetic.
examples.sentence_zh: 雨打竹叶声是经典的中式意境。

examples.sentence: We canceled the picnic because of the sudden rain.
examples.sentence_zh: 因为突然下雨我们取消了野餐。

examples.sentence: The constant rain made the Great Wall look like an ink painting.
examples.sentence_zh: 连绵下雨让长城看起来像水墨画。

examples.sentence: The rain in Seattle inspired many tech startups.
examples.sentence_zh: 西雅图的下雨催生了许多科技创业。

examples.sentence: A rainy day is perfect for hotpot and mahjong.
examples.sentence_zh: 雨天最适合吃火锅打麻将。

examples.sentence: It's raining cats and dogs during the plum rain season.
examples.sentence_zh: 梅雨季节天天下倾盆大雨。

examples.sentence: The protesters rained flower petals on the soldiers.
examples.sentence_zh: 抗议者们向士兵们抛洒花瓣雨。

examples.sentence: The delivery guys work rain or shine.
examples.sentence_zh: 外卖小哥风雨无阻地工作。

examples.sentence: Confetti rained down on the Spring Festival gala performers.
examples.sentence_zh: 彩纸屑在春晚表演者头上倾泻而下。

teach: rain是天气界的顶流🌧️！古人说'好雨知时节'（timely rain），现代人说'雨神萧敬腾'（Rain God）。'下红包雨'叫red packet rain💴，'被骂到狗血淋头'是get rained on with curses🐶。记住：rain cats and dogs不是动物雨，是暴雨！

tips: 谐音梗：'润'→雨水滋润大地
易混词：reign（统治）和rain同音不同命
记忆法：把r看作云☁️，a是雨滴💧，i是闪电⚡

etymology.meaning_connection: 雨(rain)后天空出现的弓形(bow)色带

examples.sentence: After the summer rain, children chased the rainbow with their selfie sticks.
examples.sentence_zh: 夏雨过后，孩子们举着自拍杆追彩虹。

examples.sentence: The double rainbow over the Great Wall went viral on Weibo.
examples.sentence_zh: 长城上出现的双彩虹在微博疯传。

examples.sentence: Her rainbow hair matched the colors of hotpot ingredients.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的七彩发色像火锅食材般五彩缤纷。

examples.sentence: The night market was decorated with rainbow lanterns for Mid-Autumn Festival.
examples.sentence_zh: 中秋节的夜市挂满了五彩灯笼。

examples.sentence: The rainbow coalition of food delivery riders organized a flash mob.
examples.sentence_zh: 外卖骑手的多元联盟组织了快闪活动。

examples.sentence: Trying to get a verified WeChat account without real followers is chasing rainbows.
examples.sentence_zh: 没有真实粉丝却想认证微信公众号纯属白日做梦。

teach: 彩虹是天空的emoji🌈！古希腊人以为彩虹是女神Iris的围巾🧣，中文'虹'字里的'虫'是因为古人以为彩虹是双头龙🐉。说'五彩斑斓'可以用every color of the rainbow，吐槽'不切实际'就说pie in the sky（天上掉馅饼）。记住：看到rainbow要赶紧拍照，不然就像WiFi信号一样会消失📶！

tips: 谐音梗：'润钵'→雨水滋润的彩虹钵
易混词：rainbow（自然现象）vs. prism（棱镜分光）
记忆法：记住RAIN+BOW=雨后出现的彩色弓箭

etymology.meaning_connection: 复合词，rain=雨，coat=外套→防雨的外套

examples.sentence: The yellow raincoat made the child look like a walking duckling.
examples.sentence_zh: 黄色雨衣让这孩子像只行走的小鸭子。

examples.sentence: He forgot his raincoat and ended up looking like a soaked panda.
examples.sentence_zh: 他忘了带雨衣，结果淋成了落汤熊猫。

examples.sentence: This foldable raincoat can fit in your pocket like a magic trick.
examples.sentence_zh: 这件折叠雨衣能像魔术般塞进口袋。

teach: raincoat是英国人的第二皮肤☔！19世纪苏格兰人用橡胶发明雨衣时，被吐槽'穿着像移动的浴缸'🛁。搭配：'暴雨级防护'叫monsoon-proof raincoat，'塑料雨衣'说poncho就像垃圾袋时尚🗑️。记住：没带raincoat的下场就是变成'人形洒水车'💦！

tips: 谐音梗：'润扣他'→雨水润(rain)透衣服扣(coat)住他
易混词：waterproof jacket（防水夹克，不一定长款）

etymology.meaning_connection: 复合词，rain(雨)+drop(滴)→直接描述雨滴的物理形态

examples.sentence: Each raindrop made a perfect circle in the lake like nature's stamps.
examples.sentence_zh: 每颗雨滴在湖面印出完美圆圈，像大自然的印章。

examples.sentence: The raindrop on my window traced a path like a drunken spider.
examples.sentence_zh: 窗上的雨滴像醉酒的蜘蛛般蜿蜒滑落。

examples.sentence: Morning raindrops glittered on spiderwebs like diamond necklaces.
examples.sentence_zh: 晨间的雨点在蛛网上闪烁如钻石项链。

examples.sentence: The sudden raindrops sent street vendors scrambling for cover.
examples.sentence_zh: 骤降的雨点让摊贩们慌忙找地方躲雨。

examples.sentence: Meteorologists measure raindrop size with laser devices.
examples.sentence_zh: 气象学家用激光设备测量雨滴大小。

teach: raindrop是天空的眼泪💧还是云朵的快递？古人以为雨滴是天使的针脚（rain+drop=天使缝补天空的线头🧵）。说'倾盆大雨'叫rain cats and dogs🐱🐶，'毛毛雨'是spitting rain。记住：每颗raindrop都是未完成的跳水动作💦！

tips: 视觉记忆：把d看成雨伞☔，整个单词就像雨打在伞上的声音
易混词：teardrop(泪滴) vs raindrop(雨滴)

etymology.meaning_connection: 复合词，字面意思为'雨(rain)落下(fall)'

examples.sentence: The sudden rainfall turned Chengdu's streets into instant rivers.
examples.sentence_zh: 突如其来的降雨瞬间让成都的街道变成了河流。

examples.sentence: Cherry blossoms danced in the April rainfall like pink snowflakes.
examples.sentence_zh: 樱花在四月的降雨中起舞，宛如粉色的雪花。

examples.sentence: Annual rainfall in Beijing is equivalent to 500 million Olympic swimming pools.
examples.sentence_zh: 北京的年降雨量相当于5亿个奥运标准泳池的水量。

examples.sentence: Meteorologists measure rainfall with devices resembling upside-down umbrellas.
examples.sentence_zh: 气象学家用形似倒置雨伞的装置测量降雨量。

teach: rainfall其实是天空在刷存在感☔️！古人用'雨师'称呼雨神🌧️，现代人说'下猫下狗'(It's raining cats and dogs)表示暴雨。要知道：1) 梅雨季叫plum rains不是真的下李子🍑 2) '人工降雨'是cloud seeding就像给云朵打疫苗💉 3) 吐槽天气差可以说'More rain than a waterproof phone can handle'（雨大到防水手机都扛不住）🌂☔️

tips: 谐音梗：'润发哦'→周润发(rainfall)在雨中甩头发
易混词：rainfall（自然降水）vs. precipitation（所有形式降水含雪/冰雹）
记忆法：rain+fall=雨落下→联想微信'下雨了'表情包

etymology.meaning_connection: 复合词，rain=雨，forest=森林→因年降雨量2000mm以上形成的独特生态系统

examples.sentence: The Amazon rainforest produces 20% of Earth's oxygen.
examples.sentence_zh: 亚马逊雨林制造了地球20%的氧气。

examples.sentence: Tropical rainforests are being destroyed at 10 soccer fields per minute.
examples.sentence_zh: 热带雨林正以每分钟10个足球场的速度消失。

examples.sentence: Monkeys swing through the rainforest canopy like natural acrobats.
examples.sentence_zh: 猴子像天然杂技演员般在雨林冠层间荡跃。

examples.sentence: Bubble tea shops now promote rainforest conservation with eco-friendly cups.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶茶店正用环保杯推广雨林保护理念。

teach: rainforest是地球的天然空调❄️！想象每棵树都是WIFI路由器📶（1棵树=1000物种的网络）。要夸'环境好'说pristine rainforest（原始雨林），吐槽'闷热'就说sauna-like rainforest（桑拿雨林）。记住：雨林不是jungle（丛林），后者特指热带密林🌴，而rainforest是精密生态系统！

tips: 拆解记忆：rain（雨）+forest（森林）= 全年下雨的超级森林
易混词对比：jungle强调植被密集，rainforest侧重生态功能

etymology.meaning_connection: rain=雨，storm=暴风雨→字面组合即为'雨暴'

examples.sentence: The sudden rainstorm turned Beijing's streets into rivers within minutes.
examples.sentence_zh: 突如其来的雨暴让北京街道在几分钟内变成了河流。

examples.sentence: Delivery riders huddled under bridges during the rainstorm, their food boxes wrapped in plastic.
examples.sentence_zh: 外卖骑手们在雨暴中挤在桥下，用塑料袋包裹着餐盒。

examples.sentence: The heavy rainstorm flooded Zhengzhou's subway system in 2021.
examples.sentence_zh: 2021年强雨暴曾导致郑州地铁系统被淹。

examples.sentence: Meteorologists issued a orange rainstorm warning for the Pearl River Delta.
examples.sentence_zh: 气象部门对珠江三角洲发布了橙色雨暴预警。

teach: rainstorm是天空在倒洗脚水💦！古代欧洲人认为暴雨是雷神Thor在发脾气⚡，广东人则说'落狗屎'🐶。遇到rainstorm必备：1) say 'It's raining cats and dogs!'（倾盆大雨）2) 带'人字拖+雨伞'两件套🩴☂️。记住：暴雨天点外卖记得给骑手打赏！

tips: 谐音梗：'润湿他妈'→暴雨润湿一切
易混词：rainstorm（短时强降雨） vs. monsoon（季风性持续降雨）
记忆tip：把storm里的'tor'想象成'托塔天王'在泼水

etymology.meaning_connection: 复合词，由rain(雨)+water(水)直接构成

examples.sentence: The ancient Chinese collected rainwater in bronze vessels for tea brewing.
examples.sentence_zh: 古人用青铜器收集雨水来煮茶。

examples.sentence: Her skincare routine includes washing face with filtered rainwater.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的护肤步骤包含用过滤雨水洗脸。

examples.sentence: Fujian tulou buildings showcase brilliant rainwater harvesting systems.
examples.sentence_zh: 福建土楼展现了卓越的雨水收集系统。

teach: rainwater是天空的免费面膜💧！古人称雨水为'无根水'，《红楼梦》里妙玉用梅花雪水沏茶🍵。现代说'收集雨水'叫harvest rainwater（像收割庄稼）。暴雨积水吐槽'It's raining cats and dogs!'🐱🐶，记住：rainwater比tap water多一分诗意🌧️

tips: 谐音梗：'润我特'→雨水特别滋润我
易混词：tap water(自来水)/spring water(泉水)

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根rain表示雨，后缀-y表示'充满...的'→字面意思为'充满雨的'

examples.sentence: The panda refused to go out on this rainy Wednesday.
examples.sentence_zh: 这只熊猫拒绝在这个下雨的周三出门。

examples.sentence: Rainy days are perfect for reading manga under the blanket.
examples.sentence_zh: 下雨天最适合裹着毯子看漫画。

examples.sentence: London's rainy climate makes umbrellas a fashion statement.
examples.sentence_zh: 伦敦多雨的气候让雨伞成了时尚单品。

examples.sentence: The rainy season turns our campus into a giant footbath.
examples.sentence_zh: 雨季把我们的校园变成了巨型泡脚池。

examples.sentence: Grandma always keeps pickled vegetables for a rainy day.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶总会存些腌菜以备不时之需。

teach: rainy是萧敬腾的英文名⛈️！英国人说'下雨'用pissing down（尿天啊！），'暴雨'叫the heavens opened（天漏了）。记住：1) save for a rainy day=存钱防老💸 2) rainy day fund=私房钱。'湿身'的地道说法叫drenched to the bone（湿到骨子里）☔️🐸🌂

tips: 谐音梗：'润你'→多雨天气润湿你
易混词对比：rainy（多雨的） vs. reign（统治）→女王统治时下雨
记忆tip：把y看成伞柄，rain在伞下就是rainy

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古北欧语'reisa'，意为'使直立'，与德语'heben'（举起）同源

examples.sentence: The sudden raise in temperature melted all the snowmen.
examples.sentence_zh: 气温骤升让所有雪人都化了。

examples.sentence: After three failed attempts, his final raise was perfect.
examples.sentence_zh: 经过三次失败尝试后，他最后的上升动作完美无缺。

examples.sentence: The farm was built on a raise overlooking the valley.
examples.sentence_zh: 农场建在俯瞰山谷的高地上。

examples.sentence: The raise of the basketball hoop challenged the players.
examples.sentence_zh: 篮球框的增高对球员们提出了挑战。

examples.sentence: Raise your glasses for the newlyweds!
examples.sentence_zh: 为新婚夫妇举杯！

examples.sentence: This song always raises memories of my childhood.
examples.sentence_zh: 这首歌总能唤起我童年的回忆。

examples.sentence: The boss raised my salary after seeing my TikTok fame.
examples.sentence_zh: 老板看到我的抖音知名度后给我加了薪。

examples.sentence: His joke raised a smile on everyone's face.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的笑话让每个人脸上都露出了笑容。

examples.sentence: The doctors managed to raise him from clinical death.
examples.sentence_zh: 医生们成功将他从临床死亡中复活。

examples.sentence: She raised an interesting question about AI ethics.
examples.sentence_zh: 她提出了一个关于AI伦理的有趣问题。

examples.sentence: We raised 50,000 yuan for the panda conservation.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们为熊猫保护筹集了5万元。

examples.sentence: My grandma raises the fattest ducks in the village.
examples.sentence_zh: 我奶奶养着村里最肥的鸭子。

examples.sentence: The fans raised hell when the concert was canceled.
examples.sentence_zh: 演唱会被取消时粉丝们大吵大闹。

examples.sentence: The party raised the roof until 3am.
examples.sentence_zh: 派对热闹到凌晨三点。

teach: raise简直就是'万能上升器'🚀！当它表示'举起'时像健身教练喊'抬高点！'💪，'提高薪水'时像老板施法'涨！'💸，'饲养'时变身农场主👨‍🌾。美国牛仔说'raise cattle'（养牛），程序员说'raise exception'（抛出异常）。记住：物理上升用raise，数字上升也用raise！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐志'→丰田车往上raise
易混词：rise（自主上升）vs raise（使上升）

etymology.meaning_connection: 动词raise（举起）的过去分词形式，引申出'被抬高的'含义

examples.sentence: The raised buttons on elevator panels help blind people navigate.
examples.sentence_zh: 电梯按键上的凸起设计帮助视障人士使用。

examples.sentence: Her phone case has raised edges to protect the screen.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的手机壳有凸起边框保护屏幕。

examples.sentence: The museum displays ancient coins with raised portraits of emperors.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆展出的古钱币上有皇帝浮雕肖像。

examples.sentence: She wore a silver bracelet with raised floral patterns.
examples.sentence_zh: 她戴着有浮雕花卉图案的银手镯。

examples.sentence: Traditional raised doughnuts are fluffier than cake doughnuts.
examples.sentence_zh: 传统发酵甜甜圈比蛋糕式甜甜圈更蓬松。

examples.sentence: The baker's secret is using raised dough for the perfect baozi.
examples.sentence_zh: 面包师的秘诀是用发酵面团做完美包子。

teach: raised是个'立体感爆棚'的单词📐！'凸起的'像盲文点点（raised dots），'浮雕的'像人民币上的毛爷爷👴，'发酵的'像你蒸失败的馒头🍞（failed raised buns）。记住：说'浮雕设计'用raised pattern，'醒发面团'叫raised dough，3D效果统统可以raise起来！🚀

tips: 谐音梗：'累死的'→面团发酵(raised)累死了酵母
易混词对比：risen（自然升起） vs raised（人为抬高）

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自raise（举起/增加）+后缀-er表示执行者，字面意思是'使某物上升的人'

examples.sentence: As a salary raiser, the HR director upgraded our hotpot allowance.
examples.sentence_zh: 作为加薪决策者，人力总监提高了我们的火锅补贴额度。

examples.sentence: The temperature raiser in this sauna uses volcanic rocks.
examples.sentence_zh: 这家桑拿房的升温装置使用的是火山岩。

examples.sentence: The panda raiser at Chengdu base wears bamboo-patterned uniforms.
examples.sentence_zh: 成都基地的熊猫饲养员穿着竹子图案的制服。

examples.sentence: Chicken raisers are switching to VR-controlled coops.
examples.sentence_zh: 养鸡户正在改用VR控制的鸡舍。

examples.sentence: The army raiser convinced him with a tank-shaped USB drive.
examples.sentence_zh: 征兵人员用坦克造型U盘说服了他。

examples.sentence: As a volunteer raiser, she organizes campus blood drives with vampire themes.
examples.sentence_zh: 作为志愿者招募者，她策划了吸血鬼主题的校园献血活动。

examples.sentence: The bake sale fund raiser collected enough for 1000 school lunches.
examples.sentence_zh: 烘焙义卖筹得的款项可支付1000份校园午餐。

teach: raiser就是'让你上头'的人🔼！工资raiser让你钱包鼓起来💵，熊猫raiser让你萌到上头🐼，而fund raiser可能让你捐到吃土💸。记住：养熊猫叫panda raiser，但养电子宠物得说digital pet keeper📱。地道表达'拉投资'叫shake the money tree🌴，'职业募捐人'是professional donor whisperer🎤

tips: 谐音梗：'瑞泽'→瑞泽(raiser)基金让资产升值
易混词对比：raiser（主动施加影响者） vs. riser（自然上升物，如面包发酵）

etymology.meaning_connection: 来自古法语'raisin'（葡萄），经晒干后成为葡萄干

examples.sentence: These mooncakes are stuffed with lotus paste and plump raisins from Xinjiang.
examples.sentence_zh: 这些月饼馅是莲蓉和新疆饱满的葡萄干。

examples.sentence: Grandma's secret zongzi recipe includes soaking raisins in rose wine.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶包粽子的秘方包括用玫瑰酒浸泡葡萄干。

examples.sentence: The best part of morning tea is tearing open warm raisin bread.
examples.sentence_zh: 早茶最幸福的就是撕开热乎乎的葡萄干面包。

teach: raisin其实是'晒太阳的葡萄'☀️→葡萄干最早是波斯人发现葡萄晒成干能保存更久🧺。要说'零食'可以叫munchies（嘎嘣脆的东西），'甜到齁'叫sugar overload就像月饼里的葡萄干🍇。记住：raisin=葡萄的阳光SPA度假产品！

tips: 谐音梗：'日晒人'→葡萄晒成人干
易混词对比：currant（黑醋栗干）更小更酸

etymology.meaning_connection: 动词raise（举起）加-ing构成动名词形式

examples.sentence: The mechanic explained the raising process for the hydraulic system.
examples.sentence_zh: 机修工解释了液压系统的起油过程。

examples.sentence: Regular raising of oil is crucial for heavy machinery maintenance.
examples.sentence_zh: 定期起油对重型机械保养至关重要。

teach: raising就像给机器做SPA💆！这个专业术语其实是'举起油液'的动名词（raise+ing），想象起重机吊起油罐的样子🏗️。搭配说oil raising（起油操作）或system raising（系统起油），'设备罢工'可以幽默说It's on oil strike🛢️。记住：机器也要定期'排毒养颜'！

tips: 视觉联想：字母R像起重臂，A像油罐支架
易混词对比：rise（自主上升）vs raise（外力举起）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自印地语राजा (rājā)，梵语词根rāj-意为'统治'，与拉丁语rex(国王)同源

examples.sentence: The raja's golden turban glittered under the sun during Diwali celebrations.
examples.sentence_zh: 排灯节庆典时，王公的金色头巾在阳光下闪闪发光。

examples.sentence: This 17th-century painting depicts a raja hunting tigers with his mahouts.
examples.sentence_zh: 这幅17世纪油画描绘了王公带着象夫猎虎的场景。

examples.sentence: In ancient Sanskrit texts, even a village chief could be called raja.
examples.sentence_zh: 古梵文典籍中，连村长也可被称为raja。

examples.sentence: The word rajah still appears in Malaysia's constitutional monarchy titles.
examples.sentence_zh: Rajah一词至今仍出现在马来西亚君主立宪制的头衔中。

examples.sentence: The Maharaja of Patiala owned 365 Rolls-Royces for daily use.
examples.sentence_zh: 帕蒂亚拉大君曾拥有365辆劳斯莱斯供日常使用。

teach: raja是自带BGM的单词🎺！想象头戴宝石王冠💎的统治者，其词源和英语royal/regal同源（都来自印地语राजा）。现代梗：硅谷CEO自称tech raja👑，而'土豪'可译作self-made raja。搭配：live like a raja（挥金如土）比spend money如流水更生动，'土皇帝'叫tin-pot raja🥫。记住：每个raja都幻想拥有泰姬陵！

tips: 谐音梗：'热炸'→当raja要处理热炸的政务
易混词：vs. raj（英国在印度的统治时期）

etymology.meaning_connection: 原始含义指'工具耙子'，后衍生出'搜集（像耙地一样）'和'倾斜（耙子形状）'的动词义，'浪子'义来自17世纪'生活放纵如耙子扫过般散漫'的比喻

examples.sentence: The old farmer still uses a bamboo rake to gather fallen leaves.
examples.sentence_zh: 老农仍用竹耙收集落叶。

examples.sentence: Kids built a sandcastle with a tiny plastic rake.
examples.sentence_zh: 孩子们用迷你塑料耙堆了沙堡。

examples.sentence: The casino installed golden rakes on every poker table.
examples.sentence_zh: 赌场在每个牌桌都装了金色钱耙。

examples.sentence: In Macau, the rake percentage determines the house edge.
examples.sentence_zh: 在澳门，抽水比例决定庄家优势。

examples.sentence: The 45-degree rake of Lamborghini windshields reduces drag.
examples.sentence_zh: 兰博基尼挡风玻璃45度斜度降低风阻。

examples.sentence: Architects adjusted the roof rake for better snow sliding.
examples.sentence_zh: 建筑师调整屋顶斜度以利积雪滑落。

examples.sentence: The Victorian novel portrayed him as a dissolute rake.
examples.sentence_zh: 这本维多利亚小说将他描绘成放荡浪子。

examples.sentence: Modern rakes party with crypto wallets instead of swords.
examples.sentence_zh: 当代浪子们带着加密钱包而非佩剑狂欢。

examples.sentence: Detectives raked through the suspect's Douyin history.
examples.sentence_zh: 侦探仔细排查嫌疑人的抖音记录。

examples.sentence: She raked the archives for the lost recipe.
examples.sentence_zh: 她翻遍档案寻找失传的菜谱。

examples.sentence: Spotlight raked across the audience during the concert.
examples.sentence_zh: 演唱会聚光灯扫过观众席。

examples.sentence: Bullets raked the wall leaving crescent marks.
examples.sentence_zh: 子弹掠过墙面留下月牙形痕迹。

examples.sentence: Grandpa rakes the courtyard every morning at dawn.
examples.sentence_zh: 爷爷每天拂晓用耙子清理庭院。

examples.sentence: Raking zen garden patterns relieves stress.
examples.sentence_zh: 耙制枯山水纹路能减压。

examples.sentence: The F1 engineer raked the rear wing for higher speed.
examples.sentence_zh: F1工程师调斜尾翼以提高车速。

examples.sentence: He raked his hat at a jaunty angle.
examples.sentence_zh: 他把帽子歪戴出俏皮角度。

examples.sentence: Live-streamers rake in gifts during holiday seasons.
examples.sentence_zh: 主播们在节假日期间狂收礼物。

examples.sentence: Netizens keep raking over the celebrity's old tweets.
examples.sentence_zh: 网友不断翻出该明星的早年推文。

teach: rake是个变形金刚🤖！作名词时：1)园艺耙子像章鱼博士的机械臂🦑 2)赌场钱耙让荷官'耙钱'比收稻还快💸 3)浪子原型来自《汤姆·琼斯》里的乡绅🎩。作动词时：1)搜索像用耙子刨地找松露🐽 2)掠过如KTV激光灯扫过包厢🎤。搭配：'rake up'（翻旧账）/ 'rake-off'（回扣）。说'赚快钱'可用rake it in，就像扫地机器人狂吃硬币💰！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐克'→锐克(rake)牌钉耙
易混词：rake（耙）/ bake（烤）/ fake（假）
记忆法：字母A像倾斜的耙子，K像耙齿

etymology.meaning_connection: rake源自古英语'racian'（收集）+ '-ed'表过去式，原指用耙子收集树叶，引申为系统搜索

examples.sentence: He raked the zen garden gravel into perfect waves.
examples.sentence_zh: 他把枯山水庭院的砂砾耙出完美的波纹。

examples.sentence: Grandma raked the soil before planting chili peppers.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶奶在种辣椒前先耙平了泥土。

examples.sentence: We raked all maple leaves into a giant pile for jumping.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们把所有枫叶耙成一个大堆用来跳跃玩耍。

examples.sentence: The gardener raked the grass clippings efficiently.
examples.sentence_zh: 园丁高效地耙集了割下的草屑。

examples.sentence: Police raked through surveillance footage frame by frame.
examples.sentence_zh: 警方逐帧筛查监控录像。

examples.sentence: She raked her memory for the WeChat payment password.
examples.sentence_zh: 她竭力回忆微信支付密码。

examples.sentence: Reporters keep raking over the celebrity's divorce details.
examples.sentence_zh: 记者不断深挖那位明星的离婚细节。

examples.sentence: The livestreamer raked in millions during Singles' Day.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位主播在双十一期间狂揽数百万。

teach: raked就像考古学家的洛阳铲⛏️！物理层面是耙落叶（rake leaves）的农民伯伯👨🌾，抽象层面是狗仔队翻旧账（rake up scandals）的架势📸。记住：'耙钱'叫rake in cash💸，'翻旧账'说rake over the past🗃️。你的前任可能正在rake through你的朋友圈呢！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐课的'→锐课的(raked)老师严格筛查作业
易混词对比：baked（烘焙）vs raked（耙平）

etymology.meaning_connection: rake源自古英语'racian'（收集），-ing表动作过程。耙子像贪婪的手指把落叶聚拢。

examples.sentence: The rhythmic raking of gravel in Zen gardens creates wave patterns.
examples.sentence_zh: 禅宗花园里有节奏的耙沙会形成波浪纹路。

examples.sentence: His autumn raking always ends with a leaf pile for dog photoshoots.
examples.sentence_zh: 他秋天耙落叶总以给狗狗拍写真集的落叶堆收尾。

examples.sentence: The tailor's raking stitch made the cheongsam slit perfectly invisible.
examples.sentence_zh: 裁缝的侧面进针法让旗袍开衩处完全看不出针脚。

examples.sentence: Raking requires holding the needle like a chopstick - 45° angle is key.
examples.sentence_zh: 侧面进针要求像拿筷子般持针，45度角是关键。

examples.sentence: Gold miners used raking to separate nuggets from river mud.
examples.sentence_zh: 淘金者用粗筛法从河泥中分离金块。

examples.sentence: The first-stage raking removed 70% of coal impurities efficiently.
examples.sentence_zh: 首道粗筛高效去除了70%的煤炭杂质。

examples.sentence: Live-streamers rake in virtual gifts like digital gold miners.
examples.sentence_zh: 主播们像数字淘金客般狂揽虚拟礼物。

examples.sentence: My mom keeps raking over my childhood math scores at family dinners.
examples.sentence_zh: 我妈总在家庭聚餐时翻我童年数学成绩的旧账。

teach: raking是'一耙三吃'🌿：1) 本义是园丁的治愈系运动（听着落叶沙沙声超解压）2) 缝纫界的'侧面偷袭'技巧→像用筷子夹豌豆🥢 3) 矿工的'淘宝'动作🧹 搭配：'rake up leaves'（耙叶子）比'sweep'更精准；'rake through'（仔细搜查）地道表达：说人瘦得像耙子→'thin as a rake'🍂 记住：这词自带'唰啦唰啦'音效！

tips: 谐音梗：'锐king'→王者（king）用锐利耙子
易混词：racking（折磨）vs raking（耙地）
记忆tip：想象灭霸戴草帽在花园耙无限宝石💎

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自rake（浪子）+ish（形容词后缀），原指像浪子般不羁

examples.sentence: The rakish speed of the electric scooter left food delivery guys in the dust.
examples.sentence_zh: 电动车轻快的速度让外卖小哥望尘莫及。

examples.sentence: She walked with a rakish bounce in her step after getting WeChat payment.
examples.sentence_zh: 收到微信转账后，她走路带着轻快的跳跃感。

examples.sentence: His rakish fedora hat made him look like a Kung Fu novel hero.
examples.sentence_zh: 他潇洒的软呢帽让他像个武侠小说主角。

examples.sentence: The CEO's rakish tie knot became trending on Xiaohongshu.
examples.sentence_zh: 总裁潇洒的领带结在小红书上成了爆款。

examples.sentence: That rakish billionaire changed girlfriends like changing hotpot soup bases.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个放荡的富豪换女友像换火锅汤底一样频繁。

examples.sentence: Ancient poets often described themselves as rakish to sound cool.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代诗人常自诩放荡不羁来显得很酷。

examples.sentence: The rakish angle of his baseball cap annoyed his strict father.
examples.sentence_zh: 他棒球帽的倾斜角度惹恼了严厉的父亲。

teach: rakish是浪子美学三件套🎩：1) 原指英国贵族故意歪戴帽子装潇洒 2) 像周润发咬扑克牌那样又帅又痞😎 3) 放荡版叫playboy，文艺版叫bohemian 4) 说'装酷'用put on airs比act cool更地道 5) 记住这三要素：歪帽子+坏笑+欠揍气质💢

tips: 谐音梗：'瑞克ish'→《瑞克和莫蒂》里爷爷的潇洒劲儿
易混词：dashing（纯粹褒义） vs rakish（带贬义）
记忆法：想象吴亦凡戴歪鸭舌帽的造型

etymology.meaning_connection: 前缀re-表示'再次'，古法语alier意为'绑在一起'→原指军队重新集结，引申出多重含义

examples.sentence: After losing three games, the team staged a dramatic rally.
examples.sentence_zh: 连输三局后，这支队伍上演了绝地反击。

examples.sentence: Her speech sparked a rally in company morale.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的演讲引发了公司士气的重振。

examples.sentence: Protesters held a rally outside city hall with panda costumes.
examples.sentence_zh: 抗议者穿着熊猫装在市政务厅外集会。

examples.sentence: The election rally featured free spicy crayfish.
examples.sentence_zh: 竞选集会上提供免费麻辣小龙虾。

examples.sentence: Bitcoin made a sudden rally after the regulatory news.
examples.sentence_zh: 监管消息公布后比特币突然触底反弹。

examples.sentence: The stock's afternoon rally saved my portfolio.
examples.sentence_zh: 该股票下午的止跌回升拯救了我的投资组合。

examples.sentence: She rallied him about his obsession with bubble tea.
examples.sentence_zh: 她挖苦他对奶茶的痴迷。

examples.sentence: Colleagues rallied the manager for his viral dance video.
examples.sentence_zh: 同事们拿经理的魔性跳舞视频开玩笑。

examples.sentence: He rallied after drinking three cups of strong tea.
examples.sentence_zh: 喝了三杯浓茶后他精神焕发。

examples.sentence: The patient rallied when hearing her favorite show was updating.
examples.sentence_zh: 听到最爱剧集更新时病人突然有了精神。

examples.sentence: Fans rallied round the idol after the scandal.
examples.sentence_zh: 丑闻发生后粉丝们团结支持偶像。

examples.sentence: 'No more overtime' became the office rallying cry.
examples.sentence_zh: '拒绝加班'成了办公室的战斗口号。

teach: rally就像火锅里的毛肚🧆——既能'卷土重来'(股市反弹)，又能'七上八下'(集会抗议)，还能'涮着玩'(善意嘲笑)。法国大革命时群众rally是举着面包🍞抗议（真实历史），现在加密货币玩家最爱说'HODL through the rally'💹。要说'加油打气'可以喊'Rally the troops!'像电竞战队教练🍗

tips: 谐音梗：'锐利'→士气锐利(rally)才能反攻
易混词：rally vs. ally（前者是集结，后者是结盟）
记忆法：把r看作旗帜，ally是盟友→举旗聚众

etymology.meaning_connection: rally源自法语'ralier'（重新集结），ing表进行时/分词

examples.sentence: After drinking ginger tea, the patient is rallying surprisingly fast.
examples.sentence_zh: 喝过姜茶后，病人恢复速度快得出奇。

examples.sentence: Pandas rallying from illness often binge on bamboo shoots.
examples.sentence_zh: 病愈中的熊猫会疯狂啃食竹笋。

examples.sentence: Bitcoin is rallying after Elon Musk's tweet about dogecoin.
examples.sentence_zh: 在马斯克发布狗狗币推文后，比特币正在回升。

examples.sentence: The housing market is rallying like a awakened dragon.
examples.sentence_zh: 楼市正像苏醒的巨龙般反弹。

examples.sentence: Protesters are rallying at the square with lightstick bracelets.
examples.sentence_zh: 抗议者戴着发光手环在广场集合。

examples.sentence: Fans are rallying to support their idol's new album sales.
examples.sentence_zh: 粉丝们正集结起来为偶像的新专辑冲销量。

examples.sentence: Netizens are rallying the celebrity for his cucumber-eating livestream.
examples.sentence_zh: 网友正在群嘲明星吃黄瓜的直播。

examples.sentence: The whole class was rallying the teacher about his new toupee.
examples.sentence_zh: 全班都在调侃老师的新假发。

examples.sentence: 'May the force be with you' became Star Wars fans' rallying cry.
examples.sentence_zh: '愿原力与你同在'成为星战粉丝的战斗口号。

examples.sentence: The fried chicken shop became the rallying point for night owls.
examples.sentence_zh: 那家炸鸡店成了夜猫子们的聚集点。

teach: rallying就像集体蹦迪💃：病人恢复是身体细胞在蹦迪（rallying health），股价回升是K线在蹦迪（rallying stocks），群众集结是广场舞式蹦迪（rallying crowd），而嘲讽简直像抖音热评区的集体蹦迪（rallying mockery）！说'东山再起'可以用stage a comeback🐉，'群嘲'叫roast更地道🌶️。

tips: 谐音梗：'雷厉ing'→恢复雷厉风行状态
易混词：rally vs. ballet（后者是芭蕾舞）
记忆法：所有释义都含'从分散到集中'的核心概念

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古英语'ramm'，指公羊或攻城槌，后引申出'撞击'动作；计算机术语为Random Access Memory缩写

examples.sentence: The zodiac sign Aries is represented by a golden ram.
examples.sentence_zh: 白羊座由一头金毛公羊象征。

examples.sentence: Farmers use rams with GPS collars to lead flocks.
examples.sentence_zh: 牧民给带头公羊戴上GPS项圈引导羊群。

examples.sentence: Ancient soldiers shouted rhythmically while operating the ram.
examples.sentence_zh: 古代士兵操作撞锤时有节奏地呼喊。

examples.sentence: During rush hour, bikes constantly ram into subway turnstiles.
examples.sentence_zh: 早高峰时自行车不断撞击地铁闸机。

examples.sentence: She rammed all her plush toys into the suitcase.
examples.sentence_zh: 她把所有毛绒玩具硬塞进行李箱。

examples.sentence: Minecraft players often complain 'my RAM is not enough!'
examples.sentence_zh: 《我的世界》玩家常抱怨'内存又不够了！'

examples.sentence: Cram schools ram knowledge down students' throats.
examples.sentence_zh: 补习班把知识硬塞进学生脑子。

teach: ram是计算机宅和牧羊人的共同语言💻🐏！公羊撞人时像16GB内存超频运行🚀，'内存爆炸'说my RAM exploded比'卡死了'更极客。视觉记忆：公羊角=内存条金手指🔌，'填鸭式教育'就是ramming knowledge。搭配：RAM upgrade（内存升级）/ ram speed（冲击速度）

tips: 谐音梗：'软木'→公羊角撞上软木塞
易混词：ram(实体的撞) vs. slam(用力的摔)
记忆法：RAM三个字母对应'Random Access Memory'首字母

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自阿拉伯语رَمَضَان (ramaḍān)，原意'灼热'，因该月多在炎热季节

examples.sentence: During Ramadan, Muslims fast from dawn until sunset.
examples.sentence_zh: 斋戒月期间，穆斯林从黎明到日落禁食。

examples.sentence: The streets come alive with festive lights throughout Ramadan.
examples.sentence_zh: 斋戒月期间街道挂满节日彩灯。

examples.sentence: Even athletes strictly observe Ramadan while training.
examples.sentence_zh: 就连运动员也会在训练期间严格守斋月。

examples.sentence: Shopkeepers greet customers with 'Ramadan Kareem' during this month.
examples.sentence_zh: 斋月期间店主会用'斋月吉庆'问候顾客。

teach: Ramadan其实是'热月'🔥！就像火锅越煮越香🥘，穆斯林在这灼热命名的月份通过禁食净化心灵🧘。现代梗：'数字斋戒'指戒抖音（digital Ramadan），开斋饭叫iftar就像春节年夜饭🍗。记住：说Ramadan Mubarak（吉庆斋月）比说Merry Christmas更有文化👍🌙✨

tips: 谐音梗：'热嘛蛋'→炎热季节的斋月像热鸡蛋
易混词：与'Renaissance'（文艺复兴）区分

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自中古英语，可能与'roam'(漫游)同源，体现无目的移动的特质

examples.sentence: Our Sunday ramble took us through three hidden hutongs.
examples.sentence_zh: 周日的漫步带我们穿过三条隐秘胡同。

examples.sentence: The professor's lecture was more like a ramble through history.
examples.sentence_zh: 教授的讲座更像是在历史中的漫步。

examples.sentence: Lu Xun's rambles reveal his thoughts on society.
examples.sentence_zh: 鲁迅的随笔透露出他对社会的思考。

examples.sentence: Her WeChat rambles about parenting went viral.
examples.sentence_zh: 她关于育儿的微信随笔刷屏了。

examples.sentence: Grandpas ramble around the park with their birdcages.
examples.sentence_zh: 老大爷们提着鸟笼在公园漫步。

examples.sentence: We rambled along the Great Wall at sunset.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在日落时分沿着长城漫步。

examples.sentence: The host rambled about AI for two hours without slides.
examples.sentence_zh: 主持人不用幻灯片漫谈了AI两小时。

examples.sentence: After baijiu, he always rambles about his youth in Xinjiang.
examples.sentence_zh: 喝完白酒后他总会漫谈在新疆的青春岁月。

examples.sentence: Wisteria rambled over the entire courtyard wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 紫藤蔓延覆盖了整个院墙。

examples.sentence: The rumor rambled through the office like wildfire.
examples.sentence_zh: 谣言像野火般在办公室蔓延。

examples.sentence: They rambled the antique market all afternoon.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们整个下午都在古玩市场闲逛。

examples.sentence: We rambled every alley of the ancient town.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们闲逛了古镇的每一条巷子。

examples.sentence: Let's go for a ramble after hotpot to digest.
examples.sentence_zh: 吃完火锅我们去散步消化吧。

examples.sentence: He rambled on about blockchain until midnight.
examples.sentence_zh: 他关于区块链喋喋不休直到半夜。

teach: ramble是'乱步'文学奖🏆！既指徐霞客式的山水漫游🏞️（ramble through mountains），也指鲁迅杂文的笔走龙蛇✍️（literary ramble）。当植物'ramble'是野蛮生长🌿，当人'ramble on'就是领导开会💤。搭配'go for a ramble'比take a walk更悠闲，说人话多直接用'He's rambling!'🐌

tips: 谐音梗：'软步'→用柔软的步子ramble
易混词：wander(无目的) vs ramble(带愉悦感)
记忆链：ramble→ambulance(救护车)→原义也是'行走'

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根rambl=漫游（来自古法语ramper'攀爬'），-er表人或物→原指无固定路线的行走者，后引申指蔓生植物

examples.sentence: The old rambler with a bamboo staff knows every alley in Beijing.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位拄竹杖的老漫步者熟悉北京的每条胡同。

examples.sentence: Modern ramblers track their steps with smartwatches while enjoying cherry blossoms.
examples.sentence_zh: 当代漫步者边赏樱花边用智能手表计步。

examples.sentence: The rambler rose has climbed over the entire courtyard wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 蔓生蔷薇已爬满整个院墙。

examples.sentence: Kudzu is an invasive rambler that grows 30cm per day.
examples.sentence_zh: 葛藤是日长30厘米的入侵性蔓生植物。

examples.sentence: Shanghai's city ramblers have mapped all the best xiaolongbao spots.
examples.sentence_zh: 上海的城市漫游者已标记出所有最佳小笼包店铺。

teach: rambler是植物界和人类界的双重漫游者🌿🚶：当指人时像公园遛弯大爷（retired rambler），当指植物时像'爬山虎拆迁队'🏗️。记住：人生如蔓生植物，要么绽放（bloom），要么疯长（overgrow）！地道说法'闲逛'叫mooch around，'植物杀手'叫black thumb🌱☠️

tips: 谐音梗：'软不了'→蔓生植物软不了杆子
易混词：wanderer（无目的） vs rambler（享受过程）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ram=漫游（源自古英语'ramian'），-ing作形容词后缀→描述无目的游走的状态

examples.sentence: We saw a rambling fox in the midnight hutong.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在午夜胡同里看见一只漫步的狐狸。

examples.sentence: His rambling walk through tea mountains inspired famous poems.
examples.sentence_zh: 他在茶山的漫步催生出了名诗。

examples.sentence: The rambling old house had rooms like a maze.
examples.sentence_zh: 这座布局零乱的老宅房间如迷宫。

examples.sentence: Chongqing's rambling streets confuse even map apps.
examples.sentence_zh: 重庆零乱的街道连导航软件都会迷路。

examples.sentence: Her rambling speech lasted 3 hours without focus.
examples.sentence_zh: 她散漫的演讲持续3小时没重点。

examples.sentence: The novel's rambling plot lost many readers.
examples.sentence_zh: 小说散漫的情节流失了大量读者。

examples.sentence: Beijingers love going rambling in Fragrant Hills in autumn.
examples.sentence_zh: 北京人最爱秋天去香山远足漫游。

teach: rambling是'三心二意代言人'🧠💨：作'漫步'时像遛弯大爷背手走🚶♂️（go rambling），作'零乱'时像被哈士奇拆过的家🐕（rambling streets），作'散漫'时像领导开会讲'我简单说三点'然后聊了三小时⌛。搭配：rambling rose（疯长的玫瑰）🌹/rambling mind（思绪飘飞），说'废话连篇'用地道表达verbal diarrhea💬

tips: 谐音梗：'软病灵'→思维太散漫得吃软病灵
易混词：wandering（有目的漫步） vs rambling（无目的闲逛）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自法语'ramequin'，原指小型烤制容器，现特指用该容器制作的甜点

examples.sentence: The matcha-flavored ramekin with molten center is their signature dessert.
examples.sentence_zh: 抹茶流心小干酪蛋糕是他们的招牌甜点。

examples.sentence: She baked mini ramekins in heart-shaped ceramic cups for Valentine's Day.
examples.sentence_zh: 情人节她用爱心陶瓷杯烤制了迷你干酪蛋糕。

examples.sentence: The chocolate ramekin with sea salt caramel will make your taste buds dance.
examples.sentence_zh: 海盐焦糖巧克力小蛋糕会让你的味蕾跳舞。

teach: ramekin其实是'法式傲娇小公主'👑：明明就是个烤碗非要叫高大上的法语名！就像把煎饼果子叫crêpe chinoise🥞。说'迷你甜点'可以叫petit four（法语'小烤箱'），但ramekin特指用陶瓷杯烤的蛋糕🍰。记住：当你用咖啡杯烤蛋糕时，你就做出了贫穷版ramekin！

tips: 谐音梗：'奶油啃'→专门啃奶油的小蛋糕
易混词对比：cupcake（纸杯蛋糕） vs ramekin（陶瓷杯蛋糕）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ram=分支（同root的ramus），-ific表示'制造'，-ation为名词后缀→制造分支的结果

examples.sentence: The ramification of coral reefs resembles giant underwater snowflakes.
examples.sentence_zh: 珊瑚礁的分枝像是水下巨型雪花。

examples.sentence: Pruning helps control the excessive ramification of bonsai branches.
examples.sentence_zh: 修剪能控制盆景枝条的过度分枝。

examples.sentence: The ramification of subway lines in Tokyo forms a spiderweb under the city.
examples.sentence_zh: 东京地铁线路的分叉在城市地下形成蜘蛛网。

examples.sentence: At each ramification of the hiking trail, there are emoji signposts.
examples.sentence_zh: 徒步小径的每个分叉处都有表情符号路标。

examples.sentence: The Yangtze River's ramifications create fertile deltas for rice planting.
examples.sentence_zh: 长江的支流形成了适合种植水稻的肥沃三角洲。

examples.sentence: Like ramification of blood vessels, these canals nourish the ancient city.
examples.sentence_zh: 如同血管的支流，这些运河滋养着古城。

examples.sentence: The ramification of this policy may affect 1.4 billion people's dining habits.
examples.sentence_zh: 该政策的衍生影响可能改变14亿人的饮食习惯。

examples.sentence: Nobody predicted the ramification of that viral cat video.
examples.sentence_zh: 没人预料到那个猫咪视频的连锁反应。

teach: ramification是'分支狂魔'🌿！就像重庆立交桥的8D魔幻分叉🛣️，或火锅店开遍全国的衍生分店🍲。记住：物理分叉叫branch，抽象影响用ramification。'后果严重'说serious ramifications，'决策影响'用consider the ramifications。这单词自带树状图基因🧬！

tips: 视觉联想：RAM内存条+ification→像电路板的分叉线路
易混词对比：branch(具体分支) vs ramification(抽象衍生)
记忆口诀：'分支'(ram)要'具体化'(ification)才能看清脉络

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ram=树枝（拉丁语ramus），后缀-ify表示'使...化'→字面意思'使树枝化'

examples.sentence: The gardener ramified the bonsai branches to create more shadows.
examples.sentence_zh: 园丁让盆景分枝以制造更多荫影效果。

examples.sentence: COVID variants ramified like tree branches across continents.
examples.sentence_zh: 新冠病毒变种像树枝般在各大洲分叉蔓延。

examples.sentence: The Yangtze River ramifies into countless tributaries near Shanghai.
examples.sentence_zh: 长江在上海附近分叉成无数支流。

examples.sentence: Neural pathways ramify like subway lines in our brains.
examples.sentence_zh: 神经通路在我们脑中像地铁线路般分叉延伸。

examples.sentence: The debate ramified into three major controversies.
examples.sentence_zh: 这场辩论分叉成三大争议点。

teach: ramify是棵树精🌳！词根ram=树枝（想象RAM内存条也像电路分叉），-ify是'使...化'后缀。当问题'分叉'时可以说issues ramify like antlers🦌，'使分枝'就像火锅店开连锁分店🍲（ramify business）。地道表达用branch out更口语，但ramify显得超有文化！

tips: 谐音梗：'瑞士树枝'→瑞士军刀上的树枝分叉
易混词：branch普通分叉/ramify系统性复杂分叉
记忆法：RAM内存条+ify=电路分叉成像树枝

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语ramper（爬行），后引申出斜坡和猛烈动作的含义

examples.sentence: The pandas rolled down the bamboo ramp like fuzzy black-and-white tires.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫们像毛茸茸的黑白轮胎般滚下竹制斜坡。

examples.sentence: We installed a wheelchair ramp that's as smooth as hotpot broth.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们安装了如火锅汤底般顺滑的无障碍坡道。

examples.sentence: The parking fee ramp near the Forbidden City shocked tourists.
examples.sentence_zh: 故宫附近停车费敲诈让游客震惊。

examples.sentence: The excited husky ramped through the snow like a furry tornado.
examples.sentence_zh: 兴奋的哈士奇像毛茸茸的龙卷风在雪地里横冲直撞。

examples.sentence: Zombies in that game ramp around like Douyin livestreamers during sales.
examples.sentence_zh: 游戏里的僵尸像带货主播般疯狂冲撞。

examples.sentence: They ramped the stage at 15 degrees so audiences could see better.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们将舞台做成15度斜面以便观众观看。

examples.sentence: Momo challenge ramped across Chinese parent-chat groups.
examples.sentence_zh: 恐怖游戏挑战在家长群蔓延。

examples.sentence: Hotpot restaurants ramp up chili oil before winter.
examples.sentence_zh: 火锅店在冬季前加大辣椒油用量。

examples.sentence: The expressway off-ramp was jammed with mooncake delivery trucks.
examples.sentence_zh: 高速下匝道挤满了月饼快递车。

teach: ramp是物理与情绪的双重过山车🎢！作名词时，它是残障通道的温柔斜面♿；作动词时，却变成疯狂动物城的闪电⚡。高速公路'上匝道'叫on-ramp，'下匝道'叫off-ramp就像火锅的鸳鸯锅🍲。要说'价格飞涨'可以说price ramping up faster than hotpot bubbles（比火锅冒泡还快）。注意：当它表示敲诈时，比景区矿泉水还黑心💸！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱扑'→动物在斜坡乱扑(ramp)
易混词：camp（露营）少个a就变斜坡

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ramp=攀爬/暴跳，-age表行为状态→原指野兽攀爬时的狂暴状态，引申为失控行为

examples.sentence: The panda went on a rampage after stealing the keeper's bamboo buns.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫偷了饲养员的竹笋包子后开始撒泼打滚。

examples.sentence: KTV nights often end with someone's drunken rampage.
examples.sentence_zh: KTV夜唱常以某人的发酒疯收场。

examples.sentence: The shopping festival turned into a rampage of bargain hunters.
examples.sentence_zh: 购物节演变成抢购大军的横冲直撞。

examples.sentence: A rampage through the snack street left no stinky tofu uneaten.
examples.sentence_zh: 在小吃街的暴走行动让所有臭豆腐都难逃一劫。

examples.sentence: Hulk-like influencers rampage through直播间 when gifts stop coming.
examples.sentence_zh: 收不到礼物时主播会像绿巨人般在直播间暴走。

examples.sentence: The bull rampages when it sees red cloth, just like me seeing unfinished homework.
examples.sentence_zh: 公牛看见红布会发狂，就像我看见未完成的作业。

examples.sentence: My mom went on a rampage when she saw my exam score.
examples.sentence_zh: 老妈看到我的考试成绩后当场暴走。

examples.sentence: We rampage through the hotpot buffet like hungry wolves.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们像饿狼般横扫火锅自助餐。

teach: rampage是'人形哈士奇'模式🐺💥！想象拆家的二哈(ramp=攀爬)+疯狂年龄(age)，完美诠释'暴走状态'🚨。'彻底暴怒'说go ballistic（像导弹发射🚀），'发泄情绪'叫blow off steam💨。记住：从广场舞大妈横扫菜市场，到双十一零点抢购，都是人类rampage现场！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱喷鸡'→鸡群乱喷导致大暴走
易混词：rage(怒气)vs rampage(暴走行为)

etymology.meaning_connection: ramp（原指'猛击'）+ age（表行为）+ ing（现在分词）→ 像失控的过山车般横冲直撞

examples.sentence: The panda was rampaging through the bamboo forest after stealing a keeper's honey.
examples.sentence_zh: 熊猫偷了饲养员的蜂蜜后，在竹林里兴奋地乱窜。

examples.sentence: Football fans went rampaging across the square when their team won.
examples.sentence_zh: 当主队获胜时，球迷们在广场上疯狂奔跑庆祝。

examples.sentence: A bull was rampaging in the china shop, turning teacups into modern art.
examples.sentence_zh: 一头公牛在瓷器店里横冲直撞，把茶杯变成了现代艺术。

examples.sentence: The influencer went rampaging through the mall during Black Friday sales.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位网红在黑色星期五促销时像旋风般扫荡商场。

examples.sentence: The gorilla went on a rampage after seeing its reflection.
examples.sentence_zh: 大猩猩看到自己的倒影后开始暴怒发飙。

teach: rampaging是'狂暴模式'💥！就像《功夫熊猫》里阿宝偷吃饼干后的状态🐼，或是双11零点抢购的大妈们🛒。说'暴怒'可以用on a rampage，比如'老板看到报表后went on a rampage'。记住：这不是普通的跑，是拆家二哈式冲锋🐕！搭配'like a rampaging bull'（像发疯的公牛）超形象！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱跑劲'→用尽力气乱跑
易混词对比：rampant（泛滥的）vs rampaging（暴走的）
联想：RAM内存爆满+page疯狂翻页→电脑死机般的混乱状态

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ramp=攀爬/暴跳（来自古法语ramper），-ant表形容词→原指野兽后腿站立扑击的姿态，后引申出'失控蔓延'的负面含义

examples.sentence: Rampant piracy nearly destroyed the Chinese film industry in 2005.
examples.sentence_zh: 猖獗的盗版在2005年几乎摧毁中国电影业。

examples.sentence: Counterfeit goods remain rampant in some night markets.
examples.sentence_zh: 某些夜市假货依旧猖獗。

examples.sentence: Rampant ivy has covered the Great Wall section at Mutianyu.
examples.sentence_zh: 蔓生的常春藤已覆盖慕田峪长城段。

examples.sentence: The vineyard failed due to rampant grapevine diseases.
examples.sentence_zh: 由于葡萄藤病害蔓生，该葡萄园倒闭了。

examples.sentence: Rampant inflation made lamb hotpot unaffordable.
examples.sentence_zh: 猛烈的通胀让羊肉火锅变成奢侈品。

examples.sentence: Typhoon Lekima caused rampant damage to Zhejiang in 2019.
examples.sentence_zh: 2019年利奇马台风对浙江造成猛烈破坏。

examples.sentence: The rampant lion emblem symbolizes courage in Chinese architecture.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国建筑中跃立的狮子图腾象征勇气。

examples.sentence: Stone rampant dragons guard the imperial palace gates.
examples.sentence_zh: 石刻的腾龙守卫着皇宫大门。

examples.sentence: AI deepfake scams are running rampant on dating apps.
examples.sentence_zh: AI换脸骗局在交友软件上失控蔓延。

teach: rampant是'洪荒之力'💥：最初形容狮子后腿站立（像舞狮动作🦁），现在多指坏事'杀疯了'的状态。说'假货猖獗'用rampant fakes，'房价暴涨'说rampant prices。英国徽章学中rampant指动物站立姿态（像苏格兰国旗上的狮子🗡️），记住：看到rampant要么是猛兽，要么是猛涨！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱跑的'→失控乱跑的状态
易混词对比：rampant(负面失控) vs. prevalent(中性流行)

etymology.meaning_connection: 古法语rempart=重新(re)+防御(emparer)，字面意思是'加固的防御工事'

examples.sentence: The Great Wall's ramparts snake across mountain ridges like a stone dragon.
examples.sentence_zh: 长城的防御墙像石龙般蜿蜒在山脊上。

examples.sentence: Tourists can walk on the medieval ramparts of Dubrovnik's old town.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客可以步行在杜布罗夫尼克古城的中世纪城墙上。

examples.sentence: Language barrier became their cultural rampart.
examples.sentence_zh: 语言障碍成了他们的文化壁垒。

examples.sentence: The CEO built a rampart of patents around the company's core technology.
examples.sentence_zh: CEO用专利壁垒保护公司的核心技术。

examples.sentence: The ancient capital was ramparted with three layers of walls.
examples.sentence_zh: 这座古都用三层城墙环绕防护。

examples.sentence: They ramparted the village with thorn bushes against wild animals.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们用荆棘丛围绕村庄防御野兽。

examples.sentence: China's Great Firewall serves as a digital rampart for cyber security.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国的防火墙是网络安全的数字城墙。

teach: rampart是古代版的'防沉迷系统'🛡️！长城就是超级plus版的rampart，而现代人用'知识壁垒'当rampart🧠。要说'严防死守'可以说fortify like a rampart（像城墙般加固），'突破防线'叫scale the rampart（翻越城墙）。记住：你的能力就是最好的职场rampart💪！

tips: 谐音梗：'榔头破'→用榔头破(rampart)城墙
对比记忆：rampart(防御墙) vs rampant(猖獗的)→有P(protection)的是保护墙
联想：RAM(内存)+part(部分)→电脑防火墙就像内存的防护部分

etymology.meaning_connection: ram=撞击，rod=杆→原指装填弹药用的推杆，后衍生出'死板'比喻义

examples.sentence: The museum displayed an antique ramrod used in 18th-century muskets.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆展出了18世纪火枪使用的古董输弹杆。

examples.sentence: Reenactors demonstrated how to load a rifle using a ramrod.
examples.sentence_zh: 历史重现者演示了如何用输弹杆装填步枪。

examples.sentence: Our math teacher was such a ramrod that he measured margins with a ruler.
examples.sentence_zh: 数学老师刻板到用尺子量作业页边距。

examples.sentence: The CEO is known as a ramrod who insists on neckties in 40℃ weather.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位CEO是有名的老古板，40度高温也坚持要求系领带。

examples.sentence: The soldier stood ramrod straight during the flag-raising ceremony.
examples.sentence_zh: 升旗仪式上士兵站得笔直如松。

examples.sentence: Her ramrod posture comes from years of ballet training.
examples.sentence_zh: 她笔挺的仪态源自多年的芭蕾训练。

examples.sentence: His ramrod manner of speaking made the apology sound insincere.
examples.sentence_zh: 他生硬的说话方式让道歉显得毫无诚意。

examples.sentence: The translation was technically accurate but ramrod in style.
examples.sentence_zh: 译文虽然准确但文风僵硬。

examples.sentence: The skyscrapers in Lujiazui stand ramrod straight against the sky.
examples.sentence_zh: 陆家嘴的摩天大楼如剑指苍穹般笔直矗立。

teach: ramrod是个'杠精'本精💢！原指大炮装弹的铁杆（物理杠精），后来形容刻板的人（精神杠精）🤖。美国西部片里牛仔常说'stiff as a ramrod'形容人僵硬得像根通条🔫。要吐槽'死脑筋'可以说hardheaded，形容'站得笔直'可以说straight as a poker♠️。记住：当ramrod形容人时，基本等于说对方是'人形标尺'📏！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱入的'→死板的人总是乱入打断别人
易混词：rigid（侧重物理硬度）/inflexible（侧重拒绝改变）

etymology.meaning_connection: 可能源自18世纪方言'ramshackled'（被洗劫的），ram本指公羊冲撞，shackle指镣铐→像被羊撞散架的牢笼

examples.sentence: The ramshackle noodle stand survived three typhoons.
examples.sentence_zh: 这家摇摇欲坠的面摊挺过了三次台风。

examples.sentence: Tourists love taking photos with the ramshackle hut near the Great Wall.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客们爱和长城边那座摇摇欲坠的小屋合影。

examples.sentence: His ramshackle lifestyle finally changed after becoming a dad.
examples.sentence_zh: 当爸爸后，他放荡不羁的生活方式终于改变了。

examples.sentence: The poet's ramshackle charm attracted many admirers.
examples.sentence_zh: 诗人放荡不羁的魅力吸引了许多崇拜者。

examples.sentence: That ramshackle house is actually a historic monument.
examples.sentence_zh: 那座危房其实是历史遗迹。

examples.sentence: The band's ramshackle performance became a viral hit.
examples.sentence_zh: 乐队随性的演出意外走红网络。

teach: ramshackle是'羊驼式崩溃'🦙！想象公羊(ram)撞散(shackle)篱笆的样子→既形容物理摇晃（如快散架的三轮车🚲），也形容生活方式混乱（如通宵打游戏的你🎮）。搭配'ramshackle charm'指邋遢但迷人的特质，'像危房一样不稳定'可以说shaky as a ramshackle hut。记住：这词自带嘎吱声响效果！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱晒口'→东西乱晒导致摇摇欲坠
易混词：rickety（侧重结构不牢）, dilapidated（完全破败）
记忆法：ram(公羊)+shackle(镣铐)=被羊撞散的牢笼

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自西班牙语rancho（临时营地），后演变为固定牧场

examples.sentence: The Texas ranch has more cows than the local Walmart has shoppers.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个德州牧场的牛比当地沃尔玛的顾客还多。

examples.sentence: We rode ATVs across the 5,000-acre ranch chasing tumbleweeds.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们开着全地形车在5000英亩的牧场上追逐风滚草。

examples.sentence: After retiring from NBA, Yao Ming ranched in Inner Mongolia.
examples.sentence_zh: 从NBA退役后，姚明在内蒙古经营过牧场。

examples.sentence: They ranch alpacas mainly for their Instagram-worthy fluff.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们饲养羊驼主要是为了拍ins风的蓬松照片。

examples.sentence: City slickers pay to shovel manure at dude ranches for 'authentic experience'.
examples.sentence_zh: 城里人花钱在度假牧场铲粪以获取'真实体验'。

teach: ranch这个词自带牛仔BGM🎵！想象约翰·韦恩戴着牛仔帽🤠在《红河》里赶牛，这就是经典ranch场景。经营牧场叫ranching就像玩现实版《牧场物语》🐄🌵。说'大型企业'可用ranch比喻：Tencent's tech ranch（腾讯科技牧场）。记住：真牛仔从不说'howdy partner'，他们只说'git along lil dogies'！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱骑'→在牧场乱骑马
易混词：branch（树枝）vs ranch（牧场）→牛在ranch吃branch

etymology.meaning_connection: ranch源自西班牙语rancho（临时营地），后缀-er表职业→管理牧场的人

examples.sentence: The rancher wears a cowboy hat while checking soybean fields by drone.
examples.sentence_zh: 农场主戴着牛仔帽用无人机巡视大豆田。

examples.sentence: Millionaire ranchers in Texas drive pickup trucks with golden steer horns.
examples.sentence_zh: 德州的百万农场主们开着装有金色牛角的皮卡。

examples.sentence: The young rancher skillfully lassoed a runaway sheep in Inner Mongolia.
examples.sentence_zh: 年轻的牧场工人熟练地用套索抓住了内蒙的逃窜绵羊。

examples.sentence: Ranchers wake at 4am to milk yaks on Himalayan pastures.
examples.sentence_zh: 牧场工人凌晨4点起床在喜马拉雅牧场挤牦牛奶。

examples.sentence: Argentinian cattle ranchers export prime beef to China.
examples.sentence_zh: 阿根廷养牛场主向中国出口优质牛肉。

examples.sentence: Rodeo ranchers can tame wild mustangs within 3 minutes.
examples.sentence_zh: 竞技牧场工人能在3分钟内驯服野马。

teach: rancher其实是'人肉GPS'🗺️：美国西部大开发时，真正的ranch是移动的牛群帐篷⛺，现代牧场主则用卫星放牧🛰️。说'风吹日晒'叫weather-beaten face（饱经风霜的脸），'牧场菜鸟'叫greenhorn rancher（像未成熟的牛角🌱）。记住：每个rancher都是会骑马的CEO！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱骑啊'→牧场工人整天乱骑马
易混词：farmer(小农) vs rancher(大牧场主)
记忆法：ranch+er=在ranch工作的人

etymology.meaning_connection: ranch源自西班牙语rancho（临时营地），-ing表行为→原指在临时营地放牧，后演变为牧场经营

examples.sentence: Modern ranching in Texas uses drones to monitor cattle herds.
examples.sentence_zh: 德州的现代牧场经营使用无人机监控牛群。

examples.sentence: His TikTok shows the realities of ranching during blizzards.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的抖音展示了暴风雪中经营牧场的实况。

examples.sentence: Argentina's cattle ranching produces the best grass-fed beef.
examples.sentence_zh: 阿根廷的牧牛业产出最优质的草饲牛肉。

teach: ranching其实是'浪起来'的牛仔版🤠！美国西部大开发时，ranch指临时放牧营地（就像蒙古包⛺），现在变成开着皮卡巡牧场的现代牛仔生活🚜。要说'牧场主'叫rancher（不是Ranch汉堡🍔！），'放牧'用herd就像在《动物森友会》赶羊🐑。记住：没有wifi的ranching才是真·荒野求生！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱骑'→在牧场乱骑马
易混词对比：ranch（牧场） vs. branch（树枝）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自西班牙语'rancho'（军营/农场），词尾-o表地点后缀，与英语ranch（牧场）同源

examples.sentence: The rancho skillfully herded cattle with his lasso under the scorching sun.
examples.sentence_zh: 牧人在烈日下熟练地用套索驱赶牛群。

examples.sentence: Every rancho in Texas wears a hat that could double as a satellite dish.
examples.sentence_zh: 每个得州牧人的帽子大得能当卫星天线用。

examples.sentence: The migrant workers slept in a drafty rancho with tin roof.
examples.sentence_zh: 农民工住在漏风的铁皮顶棚屋里。

examples.sentence: That rancho looks like it was built with Lego by drunk cowboys.
examples.sentence_zh: 那棚屋像是醉汉用乐高搭的。

examples.sentence: The 10,000-acre rancho supplies wagyu beef to Michelin restaurants.
examples.sentence_zh: 这万亩牧场向米其林餐厅供应和牛。

examples.sentence: His rancho has more emoji-worthy sunsets than Instagram influencers.
examples.sentence_zh: 他牧场的日落比网红打卡地还上镜。

examples.sentence: Nashville blends rancho culture with neon-lit honky-tonk bars.
examples.sentence_zh: 纳什维尔将牧场文化与霓虹灯乡村酒吧相融合。

teach: rancho是西班牙语给英语的土味礼物🎁！想象：1) 牧人(vaquero)的宽边帽比脸盆还大🤠 2) 棚屋像被龙卷风吻过的纸牌屋♠️ 3) 牧场实际是动物版996公司🐄。搭配：'big rancho energy'（土豪牧场主气质）/ 'rancho yoga'（边放牧边拉伸）。说'穷得叮当响'叫dirt-poor rancher（土里刨食的牧人）💸🌵🐎

tips: 谐音梗：'软壳'→牧场棚屋是软壳蜗居
易混词：ranch（现代化牧场） vs rancho（原生态牧场）
记忆法：记住字母O像牧场的圆形栅栏

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根ranc=腐败变质，后缀-id表性质→腐败变质的状态

examples.sentence: The rancid smell from the deep fryer made customers hold their noses.
examples.sentence_zh: 油炸锅散发的腐臭味让顾客们捏住了鼻子。

examples.sentence: That durian ice cream tastes like rancid butter to foreigners.
examples.sentence_zh: 对外国人来说，榴莲冰淇淋尝起来像腐臭的黄油。

examples.sentence: A rancid baozi filling ruined my breakfast.
examples.sentence_zh: 一个腐臭的包子馅毁了我的早餐。

examples.sentence: The fridge smelled like rancid milk after the power outage.
examples.sentence_zh: 停电后冰箱闻起来像腐臭的牛奶。

teach: rancid这个词是'嗅觉刺客'👃💣！想象你打开放了3个月的外卖盒🍱（visual metaphor）。古人用rancid形容变质猪油，现在可吐槽：1）'你的点子很rancid'=馊主意 2）'This relationship turned rancid'=感情变质了。记住：说食物spoiled是普通坏，rancid是油脂腐败的生化武器级恶臭☠️！搭配：rancid oil地沟油 / rancid attitude腐臭态度。

tips: 谐音梗：'软死的'→软死的(rancid)肥肉最臭
易混词对比：rotten泛指腐烂，rancid特指油脂变质
记忆TIP：把ran+cid想成'ran（跑）+cid（杀死）→闻到味道就跑，能杀死食欲

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根rancor=怨恨（来自拉丁语rancere'发臭'），后缀-ous表性质→像腐肉般充满恶意的

examples.sentence: The rancorous debate about pineapple pizza lasted 3 hours.
examples.sentence_zh: 关于菠萝披萨的深恨争论持续了三小时。

examples.sentence: Her rancorous glare could melt an ice sculpture.
examples.sentence_zh: 她充满恨意的眼神能融化冰雕。

examples.sentence: The YouTube comment section became rancorous after the gaming livestream.
examples.sentence_zh: 游戏直播后的YouTube评论区充满恶意。

examples.sentence: He sent a rancorous email with 15 exclamation marks!!!
examples.sentence_zh: 他发了封带15个感叹号的恶意邮件！！！

examples.sentence: The office had a rancorous atmosphere after the salary cuts.
examples.sentence_zh: 降薪后的办公室充满敌意氛围。

teach: rancorous其实是'怨气冲天'💢！词源rancor本指肉类腐烂的恶臭🤢，就像评论区互喷的酸臭味。要说'阴阳怪气'可用passive-aggressive，'玻璃心'叫snowflake❄️。记住：当同事露出rancorous微笑时，快跑！🚨

tips: 谐音梗：'软壳肉丝'→软壳螃蟹的肉丝都充满怨恨
对比记忆：rancorous（持久恨意） vs. angry（短暂愤怒）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语randir(奔跑)，引申为无目的行动

examples.sentence: The lottery draw is based on pure random.
examples.sentence_zh: 彩票抽奖完全基于随机性。

examples.sentence: WeChat's red packet amounts are generated by random.
examples.sentence_zh: 微信红包金额由随机算法生成。

examples.sentence: He made a random choice between milk tea and coffee.
examples.sentence_zh: 他在奶茶和咖啡间做了任意选择。

examples.sentence: The teacher called on random students to answer.
examples.sentence_zh: 老师任意点名让学生回答。

examples.sentence: His random scribbles filled the notebook margins.
examples.sentence_zh: 笔记本边缘满是他胡乱的涂鸦。

examples.sentence: Don't make random guesses on the exam!
examples.sentence_zh: 考试时不要胡乱猜答案！

examples.sentence: The app shows random cat videos daily.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个APP每天推送随机猫咪视频。

examples.sentence: We conducted random sampling for the survey.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们采用随机抽样进行这项调查。

examples.sentence: She typed random on the keyboard pretending to work.
examples.sentence_zh: 她假装工作胡乱敲打键盘。

examples.sentence: The toddler arranged the blocks random.
examples.sentence_zh: 幼儿胡乱排列积木。

examples.sentence: The security check picks passengers at random.
examples.sentence_zh: 安检随机抽查乘客。

examples.sentence: He opened the dictionary at random for vocabulary learning.
examples.sentence_zh: 他随机翻开词典学习单词。

teach: random就像盲盒🎁：可能是惊喜（随机猫片🐱）也可能是惊吓（胡乱答题❌）。程序员说'真随机'要用骰子🎲，普通人说'随便'就是at random。搭配'random fact'（冷知识）/ 'random thought'（脑洞），吐槽无逻辑可以说'that's so random!'（太跳脱了吧！）

tips: 谐音梗：'乱蹬'→ random胡乱蹬腿
易混词：casual(随性的) vs random(无规律的)

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根random=随机，-ise表动词化，-ed表过去式/完成态→使随机化的过程

examples.sentence: The experiment randomised participants into three groups like shuffling poker cards.
examples.sentence_zh: 该实验像洗扑克牌般将参与者随机分成三组。

examples.sentence: TikTok's algorithm randomised video recommendations to test user preferences.
examples.sentence_zh: 抖音算法随机化视频推荐以测试用户偏好。

examples.sentence: This new COVID vaccine was tested through randomised controlled trials worldwide.
examples.sentence_zh: 这款新冠疫苗通过全球随机对照试验进行测试。

teach: randomised是科研界的摇号系统🎲！就像把实验对象扔进彩票机搅匀（randomised grouping），医学论文必备短语RCT（randomised controlled trial）其实是'公平较量'的学术说法🥼。搭配'randomised selection'像抽盲盒📦，说'随机分配'用地道的'toss into the mix'。记住：人生就像randomised实验，关键看你怎么分析数据！📊

tips: 谐音梗：'软的米粉的'→软米粉随机撒(randomised)在蒸笼里
对比记忆：randomised（人为随机化） vs random（自然随机）

etymology.meaning_connection: random=随机的，-ize=使...化→使其变得随机

examples.sentence: The teacher randomized the seating arrangement to prevent cheating.
examples.sentence_zh: 老师随机安排了座位以防作弊。

examples.sentence: Scientists randomized the test groups to ensure unbiased results.
examples.sentence_zh: 科学家们将测试组随机化以确保结果无偏颇。

examples.sentence: The lottery machine randomizes selection of winning numbers.
examples.sentence_zh: 彩票机随机选择中奖号码。

examples.sentence: We'll randomize selection of participants for fairness.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们将随机选择参与者以保证公平。

teach: randomize就像抽奖转盘🎡：把东西全扔进搅拌机按下按钮🔘（randomize the list）。程序员最爱说'Let's randomize it!'就像火锅选辣度🌶️。要说'随便'可以道'up to you'，但科学实验必须randomize！搭配：randomize playlist（随机播放歌单） / randomize test questions（随机组卷）。记住：生活需要惊喜，但实验必须randomize！🎲🤖🎯

tips: 谐音梗：'乱等麦子'→把麦子(randomize)乱撒
易混词对比：random（adj.随机的） vs randomize（v.使随机化）
记忆tip：-ize结尾常表示'使...化'，如modernize（现代化）

etymology.meaning_connection: random源自古法语randir（疾跑），-ly副词后缀→原指'像无头苍蝇乱跑那样'

examples.sentence: They randomly bumped into each other at a spicy hotpot restaurant.
examples.sentence_zh: 他们在一家麻辣火锅店偶然相遇。

examples.sentence: The discovery was made randomly during a TikTok livestream.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个发现是在抖音直播时偶然获得的。

examples.sentence: He randomly pressed buttons on the elevator like playing whack-a-mole.
examples.sentence_zh: 他像打地鼠般胡乱按电梯按钮。

examples.sentence: The influencer randomly mixed all sauce flavors in the hotpot.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个网红在火锅里胡乱混搭所有蘸料口味。

examples.sentence: She scrolls through Xiaohongshu randomly like a goldfish with 3-second memory.
examples.sentence_zh: 她像记忆只有3秒的金鱼般无目的刷着小红书。

examples.sentence: The drone flew randomly over the rice terraces like a drunken butterfly.
examples.sentence_zh: 无人机像醉酒的蝴蝶般无目的飞过梯田。

examples.sentence: The lucky draw winner was chosen randomly from Douyin comments.
examples.sentence_zh: 获奖者是从抖音评论区任意选取的。

examples.sentence: You can randomly pick any lane in this self-service hotpot restaurant.
examples.sentence_zh: 在这家自助火锅店你可以任意选择通道。

examples.sentence: The delivery guy was randomly selected for a nucleic acid test.
examples.sentence_zh: 快递小哥被随机选中做核酸检测。

examples.sentence: Tourists shouldn't act randomly in protected cultural sites.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客不应在文物保护单位随意行动。

teach: randomly就像摇微信骰子🎲！古人用randir（疾跑）形容无头苍蝇🐝，现代人用'佛系'形容随缘心态🙏。'随便挑'说pick randomly像在奶茶店点'老板推荐'🧋，'瞎蒙'叫guess randomly就像考试全选C📝。记住：randomly的人生就像开盲盒，永远不知道下一个是隐藏款还是雷款！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱得离谱'→胡乱(randomly)到极致
易混词：randomly（无规则）vs. casually（随意放松）

etymology.meaning_connection: random源自古法语randir（快跑），-ness是名词后缀→原指'胡乱奔跑的状态'，现指'随机性'

examples.sentence: The randomness of WeChat red packets makes them addictive.
examples.sentence_zh: 微信红包的随机性让人上瘾。

examples.sentence: Quantum physics proves true randomness exists in nature.
examples.sentence_zh: 量子物理学证明自然界存在真正的随机性。

examples.sentence: The meme went viral by sheer randomness.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个梗图纯粹靠随机性爆火。

teach: randomness是薛定谔的猫🐱！就像你永远猜不到抖音下一个视频是萌宠还是美食🍲（algorithmic randomness）。说'纯属巧合'用complete randomness，'随机抽奖'叫random drawing🎲。记住：生活就像randomness——你永远不知道转角会遇到奶茶店还是前任！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱得nice'→随机性(randomness)让生活乱得有趣
易混词对比：randomness（随机性）vs. probability（概率）→前者是结果，后者是可能性

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自苏格兰语'randy'（喧闹的），18世纪后衍生出色情含义，类似中文'浪'字的语义演变

examples.sentence: The randy crowd at the football match kept setting off fireworks.
examples.sentence_zh: 足球赛上喧闹的人群不停燃放烟花。

examples.sentence: Our randy neighbors threw a mahjong party until 3am.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们吵闹的邻居打了通宵麻将到凌晨三点。

examples.sentence: That randy old man keeps winking at flight attendants.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个好色老头不停对空姐抛媚眼。

examples.sentence: The novel describes a randy emperor who neglected state affairs.
examples.sentence_zh: 小说描写了荒废朝政的好色皇帝。

examples.sentence: The market randy yelled at everyone who touched her cabbages.
examples.sentence_zh: 菜场悍妇对每个碰她白菜的人都破口大骂。

examples.sentence: She transformed from a lady to a randy after three shots of baijiu.
examples.sentence_zh: 三杯白酒下肚，她从淑女变成了泼妇。

examples.sentence: The construction site randy carried three cement bags at once.
examples.sentence_zh: 工地莽汉一次扛三袋水泥。

examples.sentence: A group of randies started arm wrestling during the meeting.
examples.sentence_zh: 几个莽汉在会议期间掰起了手腕。

teach: randy是'浪迪'还是'浪的'🌊？在苏格兰指喧闹如广场舞大妈💃（as randy as aunties in the park），在现代英语却变成'色色的'如猪八戒👀（randy like Zhu Bajie）。说人'粗鲁'可用rough diamond💎，'好色之徒'叫lecherous old goat🐐。记住：randy这个词本身就很randy！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱踢'→randy的人又吵又爱动手动脚
对比记忆：rowdy（吵闹的）缺少色情含义
联想：Randy+Andy=一个吵闹的好色安德鲁

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'range'（排列），与德语'Ring'（环）同源，核心概念为'线性延展'

examples.sentence: The Himalayas mountain range looks like a dragon's backbone from space.
examples.sentence_zh: 从太空看，喜马拉雅山脉宛如龙的脊梁。

examples.sentence: We drove through three volcanic ranges in Iceland.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在冰岛穿越了三座火山山脉。

examples.sentence: The price range of bubble tea spans from 5 to 50 yuan.
examples.sentence_zh: 奶茶的价格范围从5元到50元不等。

examples.sentence: Her vocal range could cover all notes in 'The Moon Represents My Heart'.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的音域能覆盖《月亮代表我的心》所有音符。

examples.sentence: Librarians ranged the new books like terraced fields.
examples.sentence_zh: 图书管理员将新书排列得像梯田。

examples.sentence: She ranged her lipsticks by color gradient.
examples.sentence_zh: 她按渐变色排列口红。

examples.sentence: The Great Wall ranges eastward to the sea.
examples.sentence_zh: 长城向东延伸至大海。

examples.sentence: Wild pandas' habitats range across Sichuan and Shaanxi.
examples.sentence_zh: 野生熊猫栖息地横跨四川与陕西。

examples.sentence: The photographer took stunning shots at close range.
examples.sentence_zh: 摄影师近距离拍出惊艳照片。

examples.sentence: Spicy levels range from 'baby bear' to 'fire-breathing dragon'.
examples.sentence_zh: 辣度从'小熊宝宝'到'喷火巨龙'不等。

teach: range就像贪吃蛇🐍：当山脉时是卧龙（mountain range）🏔️，当范围时是尺子📏（price range），排列时像整理口红💄（range neatly），延伸时像高铁轨道🚄（ranges across）。'射程范围'说within firing range，'全面覆盖'用wide-ranging就像火锅自助餐🍲！记住：所有意思都藏着'延展'这个DNA！

tips: 谐音梗：'润之'→毛泽东（润之）领导红军穿越ranges
易混词：arrange（安排）需要额外a行动
联想：山脉轮廓像波浪线≈range的首字母r

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根range=排列/范围，后缀-er表人→原指管理特定区域的人

examples.sentence: The royal ranger wears a badge shaped like a stag's head.
examples.sentence_zh: 王室守林人佩戴着鹿头形状的徽章。

examples.sentence: In medieval England, rangers protected the king's hunting grounds from poachers.
examples.sentence_zh: 中世纪的英格兰，守林人保护国王的猎场免受偷猎者侵扰。

examples.sentence: Texas Rangers still ride horses to patrol the Mexican border.
examples.sentence_zh: 德州骑警仍骑马巡逻墨西哥边境。

examples.sentence: The ranger tipped his hat and said 'This town ain't big enough for two gangs'.
examples.sentence_zh: 骑警轻触帽檐说道：'这镇子可容不下两伙匪徒'。

examples.sentence: As a park ranger, she spent 300 days a year living in a tent.
examples.sentence_zh: 作为公园管理员，她每年有300天住在帐篷里。

examples.sentence: The mountain ranger guided tourists through bamboo forests where pandas live.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位山地向导带领游客穿越熊猫栖息的竹林。

teach: ranger是现实版'森林王子'🌲！美国童子军最高级别就叫Ranger（像功夫熊猫里的Master Shifu🎋），《魔戒》里阿拉贡就是顶级Ranger👑。搭配'park ranger'（公园管理员）要会分辨熊猫粪便💩，'Power Rangers'（恐龙战队）则是穿紧身衣打怪兽🤖。记住：能管树林、会骑马的都叫ranger！

tips: 谐音梗：'润着'→漫游者到处润着走
易混词：roamer（无管辖权的漫游者）
记忆链：range(范围)+er(人)=管辖特定范围的人

etymology.meaning_connection: range（范围）+ ing（名词后缀）→ 形成范围的动作或过程

examples.sentence: The artillery team made precise ranging adjustments before firing.
examples.sentence_zh: 炮兵部队在开火前进行了精确的距离修正。

examples.sentence: Lidar technology allows for automatic ranging in modern vehicles.
examples.sentence_zh: 激光雷达技术让现代车辆能自动进行距离修正。

examples.sentence: The detective's ranging through the database uncovered new clues.
examples.sentence_zh: 侦探在数据库中的广泛搜索发现了新线索。

examples.sentence: We conducted a ranging of all available options before deciding.
examples.sentence_zh: 我们在做决定前对所有可选方案进行了广泛搜索。

examples.sentence: The sniper took a ranging shot to calibrate his scope.
examples.sentence_zh: 狙击手进行了一次测距射击来校准瞄准镜。

examples.sentence: The tiger's ranging behavior was tracked via satellite collar.
examples.sentence_zh: 通过卫星项圈追踪了这只老虎的游荡行为。

teach: ranging就像你手机的GPS信号📡：既要精准定位（距离修正），又要满格搜索🔍（广泛覆盖）。军事迷知道'测距射击'叫ranging shot就像玩吃鸡游戏时的预瞄🎯，而动物学家的'ranging behavior'记录就像查看闺蜜的微信步数👣。记住：从狙击枪到搜索引擎，都在玩ranging游戏！

tips: 谐音梗：'润金'→用黄金(ranging)测量距离
易混词对比：range（范围） vs arrange（安排）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根range=范围/排列，后缀-y表特性→具有广阔范围特性的

examples.sentence: The rangy camel caravan crossed the Gobi Desert effortlessly.
examples.sentence_zh: 这支适于远行的骆驼商队轻松穿越了戈壁沙漠。

examples.sentence: Mongolian horses are naturally rangy with great stamina.
examples.sentence_zh: 蒙古马天生适于远行且耐力惊人。

examples.sentence: The rangy grasslands of Inner Mongolia stretch to the horizon.
examples.sentence_zh: 内蒙古广阔的草原一直延伸到地平线。

examples.sentence: His rangy backyard could fit three basketball courts.
examples.sentence_zh: 他家后院广阔得能放下三个篮球场。

examples.sentence: The rangy supermodel looked like a walking clothes hanger.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位四肢修长的超模就像移动的衣架。

examples.sentence: Basketball players are usually rangy with wingspans over 2 meters.
examples.sentence_zh: 篮球运动员通常四肢修长，臂展超过两米。

teach: rangy是'长腿欧巴'专用认证🏃！想象长颈鹿🦒在非洲草原漫步（适于远行），IKEA仓库般的大学宿舍（广阔的），还有你家猫主子伸懒腰时的大长腿🐈（四肢修长）。搭配说'rangy vehicle'指越野车，'rangy limbs'形容超模腿。地道表达'leggy'专夸大长腿，但rangy更强调实用性的修长！

tips: 谐音梗：'润肌'→润肌乳液让你四肢修长
易混词：range（范围）→rangy（有范围特性的）
视觉联想：字母y像伸展开的双臂

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'ranc'（排/列），可能与德文'Ring'（环形）同源，本义指'连续排列'，后衍生出等级、气味等多重含义

examples.sentence: The panda keeper holds senior rank at Chengdu Research Base.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位熊猫饲养员在成都基地拥有高级职称。

examples.sentence: Her Douyin account reached the top rank in food vlogging.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的抖音账号登上美食博主排行榜首位。

examples.sentence: Tourists formed a rank outside the Forbidden City at dawn.
examples.sentence_zh: 游客们破晓时在故宫外排成长队。

examples.sentence: The Terracotta Warriors stand in battle ranks for millennia.
examples.sentence_zh: 兵马俑以战斗队形屹立千年。

examples.sentence: The stinky tofu shop emitted a rank odor through the alley.
examples.sentence_zh: 臭豆腐店的刺鼻气味弥漫整个胡同。

examples.sentence: His socks after hiking Mount Hua were absolutely rank.
examples.sentence_zh: 他爬完华山后的袜子简直臭不可闻。

examples.sentence: That's rank nonsense about pandas being lazy!
examples.sentence_zh: 说熊猫懒惰纯属胡说八道！

examples.sentence: The influencer's apology was rank hypocrisy.
examples.sentence_zh: 这个网红的道歉完全是虚情假意。

examples.sentence: The museum ranks the bronzeware by dynasty.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆按朝代排列青铜器。

examples.sentence: WeChat ranks friends by interaction frequency secretly.
examples.sentence_zh: 微信会暗中根据互动频率排列好友。

examples.sentence: Hangzhou ranks among the top 3 livable cities in China.
examples.sentence_zh: 杭州位列中国宜居城市前三名。

examples.sentence: His new album didn't rank on Billboard.
examples.sentence_zh: 他的新专辑未登上公告牌排行榜。

examples.sentence: The manager pulled rank to get Spring Festival train tickets.
examples.sentence_zh: 经理动用职权搞到了春运火车票。

examples.sentence: The rank and file employees protested against the overtime policy.
examples.sentence_zh: 基层员工集体反对加班政策。

teach: rank就像榴莲👑：既有'等级'的高贵感（military rank军衔），又有'恶臭'的致命气息（rank smell）🤢。英国议会里'cross the ranks'指叛变⚔️，而'rank outsider'却是冷门选手🏇。记住：当你说'she ranked first'时是荣耀，但'his breath is rank'就社死了💀！实用搭配：'top-rank service'顶级服务，'rank growth'疯长的杂草🌿

tips: 谐音梗：'软壳'→螃蟹软壳时最臭(rank)
易混词对比：rank(等级) vs. bank(银行)→你的存款(bank)决定社会等级(rank)

etymology.meaning_connection: rank源自古法语'ranc'(排/列)，-ed表过去/完成态→保持行列的完成状态

examples.sentence: The museum ranked the terracotta warriors by height.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆按身高排列兵马俑。

examples.sentence: She ranked her lipsticks from darkest to lightest.
examples.sentence_zh: 她把口红从深到浅排列。

examples.sentence: Ducks ranked along the riverbank like little soldiers.
examples.sentence_zh: 鸭子们像小士兵般沿河岸排成横排。

examples.sentence: The bikes ranked neatly outside the subway station.
examples.sentence_zh: 共享单车在地铁站外整齐排成横排。

examples.sentence: Hunan cuisine ranked first in spicy food popularity.
examples.sentence_zh: 湘菜在辣味美食人气榜位列第一。

examples.sentence: This douyin influencer is highly ranked in livestream sales.
examples.sentence_zh: 这位抖音达人在直播带货中排名很高。

teach: ranked是强迫症的最爱🌀！就像军训时教官吼'排整齐！'（rank yourselves），或火锅店按辣度排名🌶️（ranked by spiciness）。说'名列前茅'用top-ranked就像金牌榜🥇，'垫底'叫bottom-ranked像扫尾的春运车厢🚂。记住：任何需要排队的地方，都是ranked的战场！

tips: 谐音梗：'软壳的'→螃蟹软壳时被迫排队(ranked)
易混词：ranked（已排序）vs ranking（正在排序）

etymology.meaning_connection: 词根rank=排列/等级，后缀-ing构成名词/形容词

examples.sentence: The university's ranking dropped after the canteen scandal.
examples.sentence_zh: 该校在食堂丑闻后等级排名下滑。

examples.sentence: Hotpot restaurant rankings in Chengdu change faster than fashion trends.
examples.sentence_zh: 成都火锅店排行榜更新得比时尚潮流还快。

examples.sentence: His ranking as a douyin influencer surprised his mom.
examples.sentence_zh: 他作为抖音网红的地位让他妈妈大吃一惊。

examples.sentence: The ranking of instant noodles reflects a nation's midnight cravings.
examples.sentence_zh: 方便面的地位反映了一个国家的深夜食欲。

examples.sentence: The ranking officer always gets first dibs on military base dumplings.
examples.sentence_zh: 上级军官总能优先享用军营饺子。

examples.sentence: Ranking cadres have access to the special parking lot.
examples.sentence_zh: 上级干部可使用专用停车场。

examples.sentence: This ranking tea costs more per gram than designer handbags.
examples.sentence_zh: 这种头等茶叶每克价比名牌包还贵。

examples.sentence: She booked ranking seats for the Spring Festival Gala.
examples.sentence_zh: 她订到了春晚的头等座位。

examples.sentence: China's badminton world ranking is higher than its soccer team's.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国羽毛球的世界排名比足球队高得多。

examples.sentence: The high-ranking meeting was interrupted by a fire drill.
examples.sentence_zh: 这场高级别会议被消防演习打断了。

teach: ranking就像游戏天梯榜🎮：清朝科举'金榜题名'叫palace examination ranking👑，现代'鄙视链'本质也是ranking battle🔝。说'顶级配置'用top-ranking specs💻，'垫底玩家'叫bottom-ranking noob😭。记住：你的外卖会员等级(food delivery ranking)决定能否优先抢到红包🧧！

tips: 谐音梗：'人坑'→掉排名坑里了
易混词：rating(评分) vs ranking(排名)

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'rancler'（化脓），与伤口未愈引发的持续疼痛相关，后引申为心理上的怨恨

examples.sentence: The dragon tattoo kept rankling after swimming in the polluted river.
examples.sentence_zh: 在污染的河里游泳后，那条龙纹身开始化脓。

examples.sentence: Her pierced ears rankled because she forgot to disinfect them.
examples.sentence_zh: 她忘记消毒导致耳洞化脓。

examples.sentence: The unfair dismissal still rankles after 10 years.
examples.sentence_zh: 那次不公平解雇十年后仍让他耿耿于怀。

examples.sentence: His joke about my cooking rankles like chili in a cut.
examples.sentence_zh: 他对我厨艺的玩笑像辣椒进伤口般让我记恨。

examples.sentence: The way she chewed gum rankled the strict professor.
examples.sentence_zh: 她嚼口香糖的样子让严厉的教授心生厌恶。

examples.sentence: Being interrupted constantly rankled him like a pebble in his shoe.
examples.sentence_zh: 不断被打扰让他烦躁得像鞋里有石子。

examples.sentence: The nickname 'Potato Head' rankled with him throughout high school.
examples.sentence_zh: '土豆头'这个外号让他整个高中都耿耿于怀。

usages.meaning: 像化脓的伤口般持续刺痛

examples.sentence: Her betrayal stuck in his mind like a rankling wound.
examples.sentence_zh: 她的背叛像化脓的伤口般在他脑海中挥之不去。

teach: rankle是'化脓'和'记仇'的双面间谍🕵️！物理上像火锅烫伤起水泡🍲（rankling burn），心理上像朋友忘了你生日📅（rankles for years）。搭配：'rankle with sb'像鞋里的乐高积木👟，'rankling memory'像循环播放的抖音神曲🎵。地道说法：'still sticks in my craw'（如鲠在喉）比rankle更生动！

tips: 视觉联想：rank+le→'让伤口乐'？化脓可一点都不乐！
易混词对比：wound（伤口）会rankle，但wander（漫步）不会

etymology.meaning_connection: 古挪威语rannsaka（搜查房屋），ran=房屋 + saka=搜索→原指彻底搜查，后引申为掠夺

examples.sentence: The programmer ransacked Stack Overflow for bug solutions.
examples.sentence_zh: 程序员翻遍Stack Overflow寻找bug解决方案。

examples.sentence: She ransacked her closet for the missing AirPod.
examples.sentence_zh: 她翻遍衣柜寻找丢失的AirPods。

examples.sentence: Pirates ransacked the merchant ship like hungry pandas in a bamboo forest.
examples.sentence_zh: 海盗洗劫商船的样子像饿熊猫横扫竹林。

examples.sentence: Museums were ransacked during the war for cultural treasures.
examples.sentence_zh: 战争期间博物馆被洗劫以夺取文化珍品。

examples.sentence: He ransacked through 50 Taobao shops for the perfect gift.
examples.sentence_zh: 他翻遍50家淘宝店寻找完美礼物。

teach: ransack是'翻箱倒柜'的维京版⚔️！想象海盗踹门搜查(ransack a house)和双十一快递员翻找包裹📦的混合体。'抢购'叫shopping spree是文明版ransack，'扫荡美食'可说devour like ransacking。记住：查资料用search，找失物用look for，只有翻得底朝天才用ransack！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱塞克'→乱塞的马克杯被翻找
易混词：search（有序查找） vs ransack（暴力翻找）

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自古法语'rançon'（赎回），词根ran=夺回，-som=支付行为→用钱夺回人质

examples.sentence: The kidnappers demanded a ransom of 100 Bitcoin.
examples.sentence_zh: 绑匪要求100个比特币的赎金。

examples.sentence: Pirates used to exchange ransoms for captured sailors.
examples.sentence_zh: 海盗曾用被俘水手交换赎金。

examples.sentence: In ancient China, scholars would pay ransom to free courtesans.
examples.sentence_zh: 中国古代文人为青楼女子赎身。

examples.sentence: The ransom of slaves was common in medieval Europe.
examples.sentence_zh: 奴隶赎身在中世纪欧洲很普遍。

examples.sentence: He ransomed his grandfather's pocket watch from the pawnshop.
examples.sentence_zh: 他从当铺赎回了祖父的怀表。

examples.sentence: The museum ransomed the artifact from private collectors.
examples.sentence_zh: 博物馆从私人收藏家手中赎回了文物。

examples.sentence: Cybercriminals ransom companies by encrypting their databases.
examples.sentence_zh: 黑客通过加密数据库向企业勒索赎金。

examples.sentence: Ransomware viruses ransom users' files.
examples.sentence_zh: 勒索病毒会挟持用户文件索要赎金。

examples.sentence: The CEO was held for ransom in a luxury hotel.
examples.sentence_zh: 那位CEO在豪华酒店遭绑票勒索。

examples.sentence: That limited edition sneaker costs a king's ransom.
examples.sentence_zh: 那双限量版球鞋价格堪比国王赎金。

teach: ransom是'人质经济学'💸：古法语里'rançon'原指战争赔款，现在变成绑匪的ATM机🏧。说'天价赎金'要用a king's ransom（国王级赎金），'交赎金'叫pay ransom就像充VIP救文件📁。记住：你的数据可能比国王还值钱👑！

tips: 谐音梗：'乱索'→绑匪胡乱索要赎金
易混词对比：random（随机）vs ransom（赎金）→随机绑架要赎金
记忆tip：Ran（跑）+ som（some）= 抢了人质要some钱

etymology.meaning_connection: 源自中古荷兰语'ranten'（说废话），后演变为情绪激烈的言论

examples.sentence: My neighbor rants about the new pet policy every midnight.
examples.sentence_zh: 我邻居每天半夜都为新的宠物政策咆哮。

examples.sentence: The streamer ranted for 20 minutes when his internet crashed during a ranked game.
examples.sentence_zh: 主播在排位赛断网后咆哮了20分钟。

examples.sentence: She ranted at the delivery guy for squashing her durian cake.
examples.sentence_zh: 她把送餐员痛骂一顿因为压坏了榴莲蛋糕。

examples.sentence: Netizens are ranting about the drama's terrible CGI effects.
examples.sentence_zh: 网友正在痛骂这部剧的五毛特效。

examples.sentence: His 2-hour rant about pineapple pizza went viral.
examples.sentence_zh: 他关于菠萝披萨的两小时咆哮视频火了。

examples.sentence: The CEO's rant against overtime culture became a meme template.
examples.sentence_zh: CEO反对加班文化的咆哮成了表情包模板。

examples.sentence: Don't believe his rants about knowing Jack Ma personally.
examples.sentence_zh: 别信他认识马云的那些大话。

examples.sentence: The influencer's skincare rant turned out to be an ad.
examples.sentence_zh: 那个网红关于护肤品的大话原来是广告。

examples.sentence: Karens rant and rave when the bubble tea shop runs out of boba.
examples.sentence_zh: 当奶茶店的珍珠卖完时，某些顾客会大吵大闹。

teach: rant这词自带语音效果🗣️！想象李佳琦怒吼'OMG买它！'的激情状态（商品咆哮），或者你妈发现你熬夜时的输出模式👩‍👧（母爱痛骂）。职场人必备技能是water cooler rant（茶水间吐槽）💼，但小心别变成keyboard warrior（键盘侠）⌨️。记住：合格的rant要有'退！退！退！'的气势和广场舞大妈的肺活量💃

tips: 谐音梗：'燃它'→情绪燃起来就要rant
易混词：rage（纯粹愤怒） vs rant（带表演性质的咆哮）
记忆法：把't'想成喷出的口水轨迹💦

etymology.meaning_connection: rant源自古荷兰语'randten'（胡言乱语），-ing表现在分词
